Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O yahdi bee ɓiɓɓe maako worɓe e taaniraaɓe maako worɓe, non boo ɓiɓɓe maako rewɓe e taaniraaɓe rewɓe. O wardi bee danygol maako fuu haa Misra.
Fulfulde_DC: O yahdi bee ɓiɓɓe maako worɓe e taaniraaɓe maako worɓe, non boo ɓiɓɓe maako rewɓe e taaniraaɓe rewɓe. O wardi bee danygol maako fuu haa Misra.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: o bem in o be-koo-aa, wiwii in okoo-a; a̧ kaia wa lɛŋ si nú Egiptɛ mɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: o bem in o be-koo-aa, wiwii in okoo-a; a̧ kaia wa lɛŋ si nú Egiptɛ mɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: ŋwale tezhilia ŋkɛ ba'a ŋwalea kwɛa ŋkɛ, hwelefefia ŋkɛ nyi kazhili ba'a nyi kami. Pɛtɛ fəghe hwelefe ta ŋkɛ ŋkɛ kadzawa Ɛzhipte.
Tupurri: AÀ hoo weere äen wo, moore äe ma twerpiirin wo, mayre äen wo de moore äe ma tenaaren wo, jar ni äe wo äuy, se hoo ra wo go Ejipte.

Francais: Voici les noms des fils d'Israël qui vinrent en Egypte : Jacob et ses fils. - Premier-né de Jacob, Ruben. –
Anglais: And these are the names of the children of Israel, which came into Egypt, Jacob and his sons: Reuben, Jacob's firstborn.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni mi semda vi gurona vi Israyel sa co hay Egipte: Yakub hiɗi gurona valamu: Ruben goora valam ma vuɗi jewna.
Bulu: Biyôlé bi bobefam bʼIsraél be nga zu Ejipte, e mbie bi, Yakob a bobefame bé: E ntôle Yakob: Ruben.
Guiziga: Israyeley musoko nga Ezipte na, slimiɗ taŋhay ani: i ti Zakop ati ziri naŋhay. Modogom ngi Zakop, i Ruben.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa inɗe ɓiɓɓe Isra'iila warɓe haa Misra: Yaakubu e ɓiɓɓe mum: Afo Yaakubu, Ruben.
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa inɗe ɓiɓɓe Isra'iila warɓe haa Misra: Yaakubu e ɓiɓɓe mum: Afo Yaakubu, Ruben.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nin o be  Israɛl  nɛ̀ zira si Egiptɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: Jakob in o bem kɔ‘i. Kaya-bem ko Jakob nɛ́ Rubɛn.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nin o be  Israɛl  nɛ̀ zira si Egiptɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: Jakob in o bem kɔ‘i. Kaya-bem ko Jakob nɛ́ Rubɛn.
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi sləa ka Israyɛl, geze ta ŋkɛ, Zhakob, ŋwalea ŋkɛ ba'a hwelefefia ŋkɛ nyi kedzawa Ɛzhipte nyi: Yɛ Rəbɛn, kwa ghate ta wəzege ta Zhakob
Tupurri: Mokay diñ ëu jar ni Israyel maga nduu wo Ejipte mono. Jakob de jar ni äe wo. Ruben, jag mbarga äe no.

Francais: Fils de Ruben : Hénoch, Phallu, Hesron et Charmi. –
Anglais: And the sons of Reuben; Hanoch, and Pallu, and Hezron, and Carmi.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Ruben: Henok, Pallu, Hesron, hiɗi Karmi.
Bulu: Bobefame be Ruben: Hénok, Palu, Esroñ a Karmi.
Guiziga: Ziri ngi Rubeney i ti: Hanok, Pallu, Hesroŋ waɗ Karmi.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Ruben ngoni: Hanok e Pallu e Hesruunu e Karmi.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Ruben ngoni: Hanok e Pallu e Hesruunu e Karmi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Rubɛn nɛ́ Hanɔk, Palu, Ɛsrɔŋ in Karmi.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Rubɛn nɛ́ Hanɔk, Palu, Ɛsrɔŋ in Karmi.
Kapsiki_DC: le ŋwalea ŋkɛ Hanok, Paləw, Hɛsron ba'a Karmi.
Tupurri: Jar ni Ruben wo: Henog, Pallu, Hetsron wo de Kasmi.

Francais: Fils de Siméon : Jamuel, Jamin, Ahod, Jachin et Sohar, et Saul, fils de la Chananéenne. –
Anglais: And the sons of Simeon; Jemuel, and Jamin, and Ohad, and Jachin, and Zohar, and Shaul the son of a Canaanitish woman.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Simeyon: Yemuwel, Yamin, Ohad, Yakin, hiɗi Cosar, hiɗi Sawul goora vi cata Kanaaniyata.
Bulu: Bobefame be Siméoñ: Yemuél, Yamin, Ohad, Yakin a Sôhar; a Saül, monafame ngone ya Kanaan.
Guiziga: Ziri ngi Simeyoŋhoy i ti: Yemuyel, Yakin, Sohay waɗ Sawul, mangal ngi zuŋ Kanaˀan.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Simeyon ngoni: Yemuwel e Yamin e Ohada e Yakin e Cohar e Sawulu, ɓii debbo Kanaaniijo.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Simeyon ngoni: Yemuwel e Yamin e Ohada e Yakin e Cohar e Sawulu, ɓii debbo Kanaaniijo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Simɛɔŋ nɛ́ Yɛmuɛl, Yamin, Ohad, Yakin, Sɔhar in Saul bem nɛ̀ zɔŋa Kanaŋ koa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Simɛɔŋ nɛ́ Yɛmuɛl, Yamin, Ohad, Yakin, Sɔhar in Saul bem nɛ̀ zɔŋa Kanaŋ koa.
Kapsiki_DC: Yɛ Simɛyon le ŋwalea ŋkɛ Yeməwɛl, Yamin, Ohad, Yakin, Sohar ba'a Shawəl nya kawəzege nya kesawa hwa wəzha ta ka Kanan.
Tupurri: Jar ni Simeyoñ wo: Yemuwel, Yamin, Ohad, Yakim wo de Sohar, de Sawul je ni may jar Kanaan no.

Francais: Fils de Lévi : Gerson, Caat et Mérari. –
Anglais: And the sons of Levi; Gershon, Kohath, and Merari.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Levi: Gerson, Kehat hiɗi Merari.
Bulu: Bobefam be Lévi: Gerson, Kehat a Merari.
Guiziga: Ziri ngi Levihey i ti: Gersoŋ, Kehat waɗ Merari.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Lewi ngoni: Gerson e Kahat e Meraari.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Lewi ngoni: Gerson e Kahat e Meraari.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Levii nɛ́ Gɛrsɔŋ, Kehat in Mɛrari.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Levii nɛ́ Gɛrsɔŋ, Kehat in Mɛrari.
Kapsiki_DC: Yɛ Lɛvi le ŋwalea ŋkɛ Gɛrshon, Kɛhat ba'a Merari.
Tupurri: Jar ni Lefi wo: Gerson, Kehad wo de Merari.

Francais: Fils de Juda : Her, Onan, Séla, Pharès et Zara ; mais Her et Onan étaient morts au pays de Chanaan. Les fils de Pharès furent Hesron et Hamul. –
Anglais: And the sons of Judah; Er, and Onan, and Shelah, and Pharez, and Zerah: but Er and Onan died in the land of Canaan. And the sons of Pharez were Hezron and Hamul.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Yuda: Er, Onan, Sela, Peres, hiɗi Zarak. May Er hiɗi Onan miti hay nagat Kanaan. Gurona vi Peres kayni si Hesron hiɗi Hamul.
Bulu: Bobefam be Yuda: Er, Onan, Kéla, Pérét a Zéra; ve Er a Onan be nga wu e si ya Kanaan. Bobefam be Pérét be mbe: Etsroñ a Hamul.
Guiziga: Ziri ngi Zudahay i ti: Sela, Peres waɗ Zera. Er ati Onaŋ a micam a ruwuy Kanaˀan. Ziri ngi Perizihey i ti: Hesroŋ ati Hamul.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Yahuuda ngoni: Eer e Oonan e Sela e Peres e Zeraha. Ammaa Eer e Oonan maayi nder lesdi Kanaana. Ɓiɓɓe Peres ngoni: Hesruunu e Hamul.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Yahuuda ngoni: Eer e Oonan e Sela e Peres e Zeraha. Ammaa Eer e Oonan maayi nder lesdi Kanaana. Ɓiɓɓe Peres ngoni: Hesruunu e Hamul.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Juda nɛ́ Ɛr, Onaŋ, Sela, Pɛrɛs in Zera; mɔ kpɔk, Ɛr in Onaŋ fea so sɛn nú Kanaŋ. O bem ko Pɛrɛs nɛ́ Ɛsrɔŋ in Hamul.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Juda nɛ́ Ɛr, Onaŋ, Sela, Pɛrɛs in Zera; mɔ kpɔk, Ɛr in Onaŋ fea so sɛn nú Kanaŋ. O bem ko Pɛrɛs nɛ́ Ɛsrɔŋ in Hamul.
Kapsiki_DC: Yɛ Zhəwda le ŋwalea ŋkɛ Shɛla, Pɛrɛs ba'a Zɛra. Nahe yɛ Ɛr le Onan, nyi kaŋwalea Zhəwda kempənji te hɛɗia Kanan. Ŋwale tezhili bake yayake Pɛrɛs: yɛ Hɛsron le Haməwl.
Tupurri: Jar ni Juda wo: Er, Onan, Sela, Perets wo de Sera, ama Er hu wo le go de Onan äi sir Kanaan. Jar ni Perets joñ ge wo diñ Hetsron wo de Hamul.

Francais: Fils d'Issachar : Thola, Phua, Job et Semron. –
Anglais: And the sons of Issachar; Tola, and Phuvah, and Job, and Shimron.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Isakar: Tola, Puva, Job, hiɗi Simron.
Bulu: Bobefam be Isakar: Tôla, Puva, Yob a Kimrôn.
Guiziga: Ziri ngi Isakaray i ti: Tola, Puva, Yasup waɗ Simroŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Issakar ngoni: Tola e Puwa e Yoba e Simron.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Issakar ngoni: Tola e Puwa e Yoba e Simron.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Isakar nɛ́ Tola, Pua, Yov in Simrɔŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Isakar nɛ́ Tola, Pua, Yov in Simrɔŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Yɛ Isakar le ŋwalea ŋkɛ Tola, Pəwa, Yashəwb ba'a Shimron.
Tupurri: Jar ni Isakar wo: Tola, Pufa, Yob wo de Simron.

Francais: Fils de Zabulon : Sared, Elon et Jahélel –
Anglais: And the sons of Zebulun; Sered, and Elon, and Jahleel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Zabulon: Sered, Elon, hiɗi Yahleel.
Bulu: Bobefam be Zabuloñ: Seréd, Elôn, a Yalél.
Guiziga: Ziri ngi Zabuloŋhoy i ti: Seret, Eloŋ waɗ Yaleˀel.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Zabulon ngoni: Seret e Elon e Yahaleyel.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Zabulon ngoni: Seret e Elon e Yahaleyel.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Zabulɔŋ nɛ́ Sɛrɛd, Elɔŋ in Yaleɛl.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Zabulɔŋ nɛ́ Sɛrɛd, Elɔŋ in Yaleɛl.
Kapsiki_DC: Yɛ Zabəlon le ŋwalea ŋkɛ Sɛrɛd, Ɛlon ba'a Yalɛyɛl.
Tupurri: Jar ni Sabulon wo: Sered, Elon wo de Yaleel.

Francais: Ce sont là les fils que Lia enfanta à Jacob à Paddan-Aram, avec sa fille Dina. Ses fils et ses filles étaient en tout trente-trois personnes.
Anglais: These be the sons of Leah, which she bare unto Jacob in Paddan–aram, with his daughter Dinah: all the souls of his sons and his daughters were thirty and three.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kayni si gurona sa Leya vuɗsi mi Yakub hay Padan-Aram, hiɗi goota va' Dina. Gurona va' sa jufayna hiɗi sa boyna li noŋ pet dok-ɦidi yam ɦidi.
Bulu: Bobefame Léa a nga biaé Yakob e Padañ-Aram, nge ô vaa ngo jé Dina. Bobefame bé a bobebinga bé be mbe bese bôte mewôm melaa a belaa.
Guiziga: Hanayna i ziri ngi Leyahay miya taŋ ti Zakop angi hirwuy Mezopotami, waɗ Dina zuŋ naŋ mongoso. Ziri naŋ mizilehey ati mongosohoy a gam jom gar na, mizli kukur makir ti makir.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Leya ɓe o danyani Yaakubu haa Paddan-Aram, non boo Dina, ɓiyiiko debbo. Ɓiɓɓe maako worɓe e rewɓe ɓe o danydi bee Leya non boo taaniko'en ngaɗi fuu cappanɗe tato e tato (33).
Fulfulde_DC: Kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Leya ɓe o danyani Yaakubu haa Paddan-Aram, non boo Dina, ɓiyiiko debbo. Ɓiɓɓe maako worɓe e rewɓe ɓe o danydi bee Leya non boo taaniko'en ngaɗi fuu cappanɗe tato e tato (33).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem lɛŋ nɛ̀ Lea koo ha̧ Jakob sɛn bɔkɔ-nú Aram nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i. Dina duka nɛ́ kpɔk boko-bem mgbara wa. Wa lɛŋ duka nɛ́ o bíí ɓu-taar-zua-taar, o bem mɛ́ be-wiwii-a in be-okoo-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem lɛŋ nɛ̀ Lea koo ha̧ Jakob sɛn bɔkɔ-nú Aram nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i. Dina duka nɛ́ kpɔk boko-bem mgbara wa. Wa lɛŋ duka nɛ́ o bíí ɓu-taar-zua-taar, o bem mɛ́ be-wiwii-a in be-okoo-a.
Kapsiki_DC: Nyi ya kaŋwale tezhili nyi yake nda Lɛya ke Zhakob mbe Mɛzopotami, tsagha wəzha ta megheyɛa nci Dina. Zlaɓe le zhigə ŋa nci ŋwale ne, mahekenemsə mahekeneghəmbe hɛ pɛtɛa nci.
Tupurri: Mo lag diñ weere maga Leya biñ ra le ne Jakob Paddan-Aram mono, äo' may äe Dina go ni. Weere äen wo de mayre äen baa wo jag äuy nen jar do swa' ti swa'a.

Francais: Fils de Gad : Séphion, Haggi, Suni, Esebon, Heri, Arodi et Aréli.
Anglais: And the sons of Gad; Ziphion, and Haggi, Shuni, and Ezbon, Eri, and Arodi, and Areli.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Gad: Sifyon, Haggi, Suni, Esbon, Eri, Arodi hiɗi Areeli.
Bulu: Bobefam be Gad: Sifiôn, Hagi, Kuni, Hesboñ, Eri, Arôdi a Aréli.
Guiziga: Ziri ngi Gatay i ti: Sifiyoŋ, Hagi, Suni, Esboŋ, Eri, Arodi waɗ Areli.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Gada ngoni: Cifiyon e Haggi e Suni e Esbon e Eri e Aroodi e Areeli.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Gada ngoni: Cifiyon e Haggi e Suni e Esbon e Eri e Aroodi e Areeli.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Gad nɛ́ Sifiɔŋ, Hagi, Suni, Ɛsbɔŋ, Eri, Arodi in Areli.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Gad nɛ́ Sifiɔŋ, Hagi, Suni, Ɛsbɔŋ, Eri, Arodi in Areli.
Kapsiki_DC: Yɛ Gad le ŋwalea ŋkɛ Sefon, Hagi, Shəwni, Ɛsbon, Ɛri, Arod ba'a Arɛli.
Tupurri: Jar ni Gad wo: Sifiyon, Hagi, Suni, Etsbon, Eri, Arodi wo de Areeli.

Francais: Fils d'Aser: Jamné, Jésua, Jessui et Béria, et Sara, leur soeur. Les fils de Béria furent Héber et Melchiel. –
Anglais: And the sons of Asher; Imnah, and Ishuah, and Ishvi, and Beriah, and Serah their sister: and the sons of Beriah; Heber, and Malchiel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Aser: Yimna, Yisva, Yikvi hiɗi Beriya hiɗi Serak ta ɓasusita. Gurona vi Beriya kayn Heber hiɗi Malkiyel.
Bulu: Bobefam bʼAzér: Yima, Yikva, Yikvi a Beria; a Sera kale jap. Bobefam be Beria: Héber a Malkiél.
Guiziga: Ziri ngi Aserey i ti: Yimma, Iseva, Isevi ati Beriya waɗ Sera sukum taŋ mongoso. Ziri ngi Beriyahay i ti: Heber ati malkiyel.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Aser ngoni: Yimna e Yisuwa e Yisuwi e Beri'a e deerɗiraawo maɓɓe debbo: Sera. Ɓiɓɓe Beri'a ngoni: Heber e Malkiyel.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Aser ngoni: Yimna e Yisuwa e Yisuwi e Beri'a e deerɗiraawo maɓɓe debbo: Sera. Ɓiɓɓe Beri'a ngoni: Heber e Malkiyel.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Asɛr nɛ́ Yimna, Yiswa, Yiswi, Bɛria in boko-nya-wa Sɛra. O bem ko Bɛria nɛ́ Ebɛr in Malkiɛl.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Asɛr nɛ́ Yimna, Yiswa, Yiswi, Bɛria in boko-nya-wa Sɛra. O bem ko Bɛria nɛ́ Ebɛr in Malkiɛl.
Kapsiki_DC: Yɛ Asɛr le ŋwalea ŋkɛ Imna, Isheva, Ishevi ba'a Beriya, tsagha wəzha ta megheyɛa nci Sɛra. Ŋwale tezhili bake yayake Beriya: yɛ Hɛbɛr le Malkiyɛl.
Tupurri: Jar ni Aser wo: Yimma, Yisfa, Yisfi wo de Beriya, blam äe Sera maygeman äaara no. Jar ni Beriya wo: Heber wo de Malkiyel.

Francais: Ce sont là les fils de Zelpha, que Laban avait donnée à Lia, sa fille ; et elle les enfanta à Jacob : en tout seize personnes.
Anglais: These are the sons of Zilpah, whom Laban gave to Leah his daughter, and these she bare unto Jacob, even sixteen souls.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: nisi kayni si gurona vi Zilpa, ta Laban vula' mi goota valam Leyata, kayn si guro sa na' vuɗsi mi Yakubna, nisi noŋ pet sumun doogo yam karkiya.
Bulu: Bobefam be Zilpa, e mbe Laban a nga ve ngo jé Léa. A nga biaé be Yakob. Bese be mbe bôt awôm a besaman.
Guiziga: Hanayna, i ziri ati dideˀ ngi Zilpahay, Zilpa i beke ngi Leya, cine naŋ Labaŋ muvulaŋ di, ɓa a yi ziri da Zakop: Taŋ kuruˀ nga merkeɗe.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kamɓe ngoni danygol Zilpa mo Laban hokkuno ɓiyum Leya. Ɓikkoy e taaniraaɓe fuu ngaɗi sappo e njoweego (16).
Fulfulde_DC: Kamɓe ngoni danygol Zilpa mo Laban hokkuno ɓiyum Leya. Ɓikkoy e taaniraaɓe fuu ngaɗi sappo e njoweego (16).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Zilpa kó-de-tom nɛ̀ Labaŋ ha̧a̧ so ha̧ bem kɔ‘i Lea nɛ̀ kòó ha̧ Jakob nɛ́ mɔ‘i. Wa ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Zilpa kó-de-tom nɛ̀ Labaŋ ha̧a̧ so ha̧ bem kɔ‘i Lea nɛ̀ kòó ha̧ Jakob nɛ́ mɔ‘i. Wa ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
Kapsiki_DC: Nyi ya kaŋwale ba'a kahwelefefia yɛ Zhakob le Zilpa nya ndeke nda Laban kakwatera ke wəzha ta ŋkɛ Lɛya: meŋe ŋkwaŋeghəmbe hɛ pɛtɛa nci.
Tupurri: Mo lag diñ jar ni Silpa wo, maga Laban hay haçn ne may äe Leya mono. Silpa biñ ra ne Jakobe, aà wo äuy hwal ti hiira'a.

Francais: Fils de Rachel, femme de Jacob : Joseph et Benjamin.
Anglais: The sons of Rachel Jacob's wife; Joseph, and Benjamin.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Rakel cata vi Yakub gurona va' kayni, Yosef hiɗi Benyamin.
Bulu: Bobefam be Rachél, minga Yakob: Yôsep a Bényamin.
Guiziga: Ziri ngi Rasel, ngwas ngi Zakopo i ti: Zozef ati Benjameŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Rahiilu, debbo Yaakubu, ngoni: Yusufu e Benyamin.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Rahiilu, debbo Yaakubu, ngoni: Yusufu e Benyamin.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Rachɛl nɛ̀ koo ha̧ Jakob nɛ́ Jozɛf in Bɛnjamin.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Rachɛl nɛ̀ koo ha̧ Jakob nɛ́ Jozɛf in Bɛnjamin.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhili nyi yake nda Rashɛl ke Zhakob: yɛ Zhozɛf le Bɛnjamɛn.
Tupurri: Jar ni Rasel waçy Jakob no: Josef wo de Benjamen.

Francais: Il naquit à Joseph, au pays d'Égypte, des fils que lui enfanta Aseneth, fille de Putiphar, prêtre d'On, savoir Manassé et Ephraïm.-
Anglais: And unto Joseph in the land of Egypt were born Manasseh and Ephraim, which Asenath the daughter of Poti–phera priest of On bare unto him.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona sa Yosef vuɗsi hay Egipten kayni: Manase hiɗi Efrayim, vuɗum guro nisin kayn ti Asnat, goota vi Poti-Fera, mul ma-ɗifinna hay On.
Bulu: Manasé a Efrayim be nga bialé Yôsep Ejipte, e mbe Asnat, ngone Potiféra, ntuni ya tison On a nga biaé nye.
Guiziga: Asnat ngwas ngi Zozef, zuŋ ngi Potifera, masay ngir walahay On, a ya ziri mizileheye le cuw da Zozef angi hirwuy Ezipte, i ti: Manase ati Efrayim.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yusufu danyanaama Manassa e Efrayim nder lesdi Misra. Asnat ɓii Poti-Fera, limanjo haa Oon, danyani mo ɓe .
Fulfulde_DC: Yusufu danyanaama Manassa e Efrayim nder lesdi Misra. Asnat ɓii Poti-Fera, limanjo haa Oon, danyani mo ɓe .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem nɛ̀ Jozɛf koo sɛn Egiptɛ nɛ́ Manase in Efraim. O bem nɛ̀ Asnat, boko-bem ko Poti-Fera, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Ɔn koo nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem nɛ̀ Jozɛf koo sɛn Egiptɛ nɛ́ Manase in Efraim. O bem nɛ̀ Asnat, boko-bem ko Poti-Fera, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Ɔn koo nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Mbe Ɛzhipte ne, nahe Zhozɛf keyake ŋwale tezhili bake sawa hwa male ta ŋkɛ Asnat, wəzha ta Potifɛra nya kande dzeghe shala mbe meleme ta On: yɛ Manasɛ le Ɛfrayim.
Tupurri: Josef biñ Manase wo de Efrayim wo go äi sir Ejipte de Asnad mani Poti-Fera je joñ feçeçre sië jag ma On no.

Francais: Fils de Benjamin : Béla, Bochor, Asbel, Géra, Naaman, Echi, Ros, Mophim, Ophim et Ared. –
Anglais: And the sons of Benjamin were Bela, and Becher, and Ashbel, Gera, and Naaman, Ehi, and Rosh, Muppim, and Huppim, and Ard.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Benyamin kayni: Bela, Beker, Asbel, Gera, Naaman, Ehi, Ros, Muppim, Huppim hiɗi Ard.
Bulu: Bobefam be Bényamin: Bela, Béker, Akbél, Géra, Naaman, Ehi, Rôk, Mupim, Hupim a Arde.
Guiziga: Benjameŋhey i ti: Bela, Beker, Asebel, Gera, Nahamaŋ, Ehi, Rok, Hupim, Mupim waɗ Arde.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Benyamin: Bela e Beker e Asbeel e Geera e Na'aman e Ehi e Roos e Muppim e Huppim e Arda.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Benyamin: Bela e Beker e Asbeel e Geera e Na'aman e Ehi e Roos e Muppim e Huppim e Arda.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Bɛnjamin nɛ́ Bɛla, Bɛkɛr, Asbɛl, Gera, Namaŋ, Ehi, Ros, Mupim, Hupim in Ard.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Bɛnjamin nɛ́ Bɛla, Bɛkɛr, Asbɛl, Gera, Namaŋ, Ehi, Ros, Mupim, Hupim in Ard.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋwale tezhili meŋe yayake Bɛnjamɛn: yɛ Bɛla, Bɛkɛr, Ashebɛl, Gɛra, Na'aman, Ɛhi, Rosh, Məwpim, Həwpim ba'a Arde.
Tupurri: Jar ni Benjame wo: Bela, Beker, Asbel, Gera, Naaman, Ehi, Ros, Mupim, Hupim wo de Ard.

Francais: Ce sont là les fils de Rachel, qui naquirent à Jacob : en tout quatorze personnes.
Anglais: These are the sons of Rachel, which were born to Jacob: all the souls were fourteen.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kayni si guron sa Rakel vuɗsi mi Yakubna. Nisi noŋ pet sumun doogo yam fiɗi.
Bulu: Bobefam be Rachél, be nga bialé Yakob, e mbe le, bese bôt awôm a benyin.
Guiziga: Hanayna i dideˀ ati ziri Raseley miya taŋ ti Zakop, a gam jom gar na, mizli kuruˀ nga mufaɗa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kamɓe ngoni danygol Rahiilu, danyanaaɓe Yaakubu. Ɓikkoy e taaniraaɓe fuu ngaɗi ɓe sappo e nayo (14).
Fulfulde_DC: Kamɓe ngoni danygol Rahiilu, danyanaaɓe Yaakubu. Ɓikkoy e taaniraaɓe fuu ngaɗi ɓe sappo e nayo (14).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem nɛ̀ Rachɛl koo ha̧ Jakob nɛ́ mɔ‘i. Wa lɛŋ ɓu-zua-naar.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem nɛ̀ Rachɛl koo ha̧ Jakob nɛ́ mɔ‘i. Wa lɛŋ ɓu-zua-naar.
Kapsiki_DC: Nyi ya kaŋwale ba'a kahwelefefia yɛ Zhakob le Rashɛl: meŋe wəfaɗeghəmbe hɛ pɛtɛ nci.
Tupurri: Mo lag diñ weere maga Rasel biñ ra ne Jakob mono. AÀ wo äuy hwal ti naa.

Francais: Fils de Dan : Husim. –
Anglais: And the sons of Dan; Hushim.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Dan: Husim.
Bulu: Bobefam be Dan: Hukim.
Guiziga: Mangal ngi Daŋ i Husim.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɗɗo Dan: Husim.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɗɗo Dan: Husim.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Bem ko Dan nɛ́ Husim.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Bem ko Dan nɛ́ Husim.
Kapsiki_DC: Yɛ Dan le wəzege ta ŋkɛ Həwshim.
Tupurri: Jar ni Dañ wo: Husim.

Francais: Fils de Nephtali : Jasiel, Guni, Jéser et Salem. –
Anglais: And the sons of Naphtali; Jahzeel, and Guni, and Jezer, and Shillem.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Neftali: Yatseel, Guni, Yeser, hiɗi Silem.
Bulu: Bobefam be Néftali: Yatsél, Guni, Yétsér a Kilém.
Guiziga: Ziri ngi Neftalihey i ti: Yasiyel, Guni, Yeser waɗ Silem.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Neftali ngoni: Yahaciyel e Guni e Yecer e Sillem.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Neftali ngoni: Yahaciyel e Guni e Yecer e Sillem.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Nɛftalii nɛ́ Yaseɛl, Guni, Yɛsɛr in Silɛm.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Nɛftalii nɛ́ Yaseɛl, Guni, Yɛsɛr in Silɛm.
Kapsiki_DC: Yɛ Nɛftali le ŋwalea ŋkɛ Yasiyɛl, Gəwni, Yɛsɛr ba'a Shilɛm.
Tupurri: Jar ni Neftali wo: Yatseel, Guni, Yetser wo de Sillem.

Francais: Ce sont là les fils de Bala, que Laban avait donnée à Rachel, sa fille; et elle les enfanta à Jacob : en tout sept personnes.
Anglais: These are the sons of Bilhah, which Laban gave unto Rachel his daughter, and she bare these unto Jacob: all the souls were seven.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kayni si gurona vi Bilha, ta Laban vula' mi goota valam Rakelta, kayn si guro sa na' vuɗsi mi Yakubna. Nisi noŋ pet sumun siɗiya.
Bulu: Bobefam be Bila, e nye Laban a nga ve ngo jé Rachél e mbe le; a nga biaé be Yakob, bese bôte zamgbwa.
Guiziga: Hanayna i dideˀ ati ziri ngi Bilahay, Bila i beke ngi Rasel, cine naŋ Labaŋ muvulaŋ di ɓa a yi ziri da Zakop. Taŋ jom gar na, mizli tarnaˀa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kamɓe ngoni ɓikkoy e taaniraaɓe Yaakubu ɓe danygol Bilha mo Laban hokkuno ɓiyum Rahiilu. Ɓe ngaɗi ɓe njoweeɗiɗo (7).
Fulfulde_DC: Kamɓe ngoni ɓikkoy e taaniraaɓe Yaakubu ɓe danygol Bilha mo Laban hokkuno ɓiyum Rahiilu. Ɓe ngaɗi ɓe njoweeɗiɗo (7).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem ko Bilha kó-de-tom nɛ̀ Labaŋ ha̧a̧ so ha̧ Rachɛl, bem kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ koo ha̧ Jakob nɛ́ mɔ‘i. Wa lɛŋ nɛ́ bíí mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem ko Bilha kó-de-tom nɛ̀ Labaŋ ha̧a̧ so ha̧ Rachɛl, bem kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ koo ha̧ Jakob nɛ́ mɔ‘i. Wa lɛŋ nɛ́ bíí mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
Kapsiki_DC: Nyi ya kaŋwale ba'a kahwelefefia yɛ Zhakob le Bila nya ndeke nda Laban kakwatera ke wəzha ta ŋkɛ Rashɛl: mberefaŋe hɛ pɛtɛa nci.
Tupurri: Mo lag diñ jar ni Bilha wo, maga Laban hay haçn ne may äe Rasel mono. Bilha biñ ra ne Jakobe. AÀ wo äuy renam.

Francais: Toutes les personnes qui vinrent avec Jacob en Egypte, issues de lui, sans compter les femmes des fils de Jacob, étaient au nombre de soixante-six en tout.
Anglais: All the souls that came with Jacob into Egypt, which came out of his loins, besides Jacob's sons' wives, all the souls were threescore and six;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sum sa co hiɗi Yakub hay Egipte, nisi sa may goy hayam nam pana noŋ pet sumun dok-karkiya yam karkiya, boyna vi gurona vi Yakub may hayɗi.
Bulu: E bôt be nga zu a Yakob Ejipte, be soʼo be émien, bese be mbe bôte mewôm mesaman a besaman, te lañe mimbom mi Yakob.
Guiziga: Mizli ngi hay Zakopoy, mikwanay naŋhay miram nga Ezipte ati naŋ na, a gam jom gar na, mizli kukur merkeɗ nga merkeɗ, mbak ngwas ngi ziri naŋhaya le.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Danygol Yaakubu fuu, warɓe haa Misra, ɓikkoy e taaniraaɓe maako fuu ngaɗi cappanɗe njoweego e njoweego (66). Rewɓe ɓikkoy maako limaaka.
Fulfulde_DC: Danygol Yaakubu fuu, warɓe haa Misra, ɓikkoy e taaniraaɓe maako fuu ngaɗi cappanɗe njoweego e njoweego (66). Rewɓe ɓikkoy maako limaaka.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bíí nutua ko Jakob nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ tɔk-tɛ Jakob nɛ̀ yaka si sɛn nú Egiptɛ nɛ́ o bíí ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, wi tɔr o kóò ko o bem kɔ̧-a̧ na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bíí nutua ko Jakob nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ tɔk-tɛ Jakob nɛ̀ yaka si sɛn nú Egiptɛ nɛ́ o bíí ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, wi tɔr o kóò ko o bem kɔ̧-a̧ na.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma mbelia Zhakob nyi kedzawa Ɛzhipte ne, ŋkwaŋemsə ŋkwaŋeghəmbe hɛ pɛtɛa nci, kaɗema mbeli keɓelate ka makwashia ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Jar maga laa wo le go äiñ Jakob day wo wo de äe Ejipte bay kee naare weere äen wo ni mono, hay wo äuy do hiira' ti hiira'a.

Francais: Les fils de Joseph qui lui étaient nés en Egypte étaient deux.- Le total des personnes de la famille de Jacob qui vinrent en Egypte était de soixante-dix.
Anglais: And the sons of Joseph, which were born him in Egypt, were two souls: all the souls of the house of Jacob, which came into Egypt, were threescore and ten.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Yosef sa nam vuɗsi hay Egipten ka ma' lo. Sum sa hay jafna vi Yakub sa co hay Egipten noŋ kaf dok-siɗiya.
Bulu: Bobefam be Yôsep be nga bialé nye Ejipte: bôte bebaé. Bôte bese ya nda bôte Yakob be nga zu Ejipte be mbe mewôme zamgbwal.
Guiziga: Ziri mizilehey Zozef miya taŋ a Ezipte kwana, taŋ cuw. Mizli ngi hay Zakopoy miram nga Ezipte, a gam jom gar na, mizli kukur tarnaˀ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Bee ɓiɓɓe Yusufu, danyanaaɓe mo nder Misra, ɓe ɗiɗo. Bana non limgal saare Yaakubu haa Misra fuu waɗi cappanɗe njoweeɗiɗo (70) .
Fulfulde_DC: Bee ɓiɓɓe Yusufu, danyanaaɓe mo nder Misra, ɓe ɗiɗo. Bana non limgal saare Yaakubu haa Misra fuu waɗi cappanɗe njoweeɗiɗo (70) .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bem nɛ̀ Jozɛf koo sɛn Egiptɛ nɛ́ bem yiitoo, o bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ Jakob mgbɔɔ si sɛn Egiptɛ mɛ, nɛ́ bíí ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bem nɛ̀ Jozɛf koo sɛn Egiptɛ nɛ́ bem yiitoo, o bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ Jakob mgbɔɔ si sɛn Egiptɛ mɛ, nɛ́ bíí ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
Kapsiki_DC: Zlaɓe le ŋwalea Zhozɛf bake nyi keya pelɛ Ɛzhipte ne, mbeli mberefaŋemsə mbelia Zhakob nyi kenzanji mbe Ɛzhipte.
Tupurri: Jar ni Josef maga aà biñ ra wo go Ejipte ni mono: Jar äoge. Ngaäa jar ni Jakob maga nduu wo Ejipte hay tay wo äuy do renam.

Francais: Jacob avait envoyé Juda devant lui vers Joseph pour préparer son arrivée en Gessen.
Anglais: And he sent Judah before him unto Joseph, to direct his face unto Goshen; and they came into the land of Goshen.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yakub gi Yuda vokomu kat Yosef, kay dum ala nam ka tuɗis hay Gosen.
Bulu: Yakob a nga lôme Yuda ôsu, be Yôsep, na a ke yange nye Gôzen. Be nga kui e Gôzen;
Guiziga: Akẽh na, Zakop a slina Zuda a mbuŋ naŋ ng'avi Zozefe, ɓa aru dumbuŋ nga hirwy Goseŋ. Ti taŋ mindilam a Goseŋ na,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yaakubu neli Yahuuda yeeso muuɗum haa Yusufu, ngam Yusufu waŋga yeeso maako haa Goosan. Nde ɓe ngari nder lesdi Goosan,
Fulfulde_DC: Yaakubu neli Yahuuda yeeso muuɗum haa Yusufu, ngam Yusufu waŋga yeeso maako haa Goosan. Nde ɓe ngari nder lesdi Goosan,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Israɛl  toma Juda yak nɛti sitɛ Jozɛf sɛn Gɔsɛn. Ŋgimbi nɛ wa hɔɔ nú Gɔsɛn,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Israɛl  toma Juda yak nɛti sitɛ Jozɛf sɛn Gɔsɛn. Ŋgimbi nɛ wa hɔɔ nú Gɔsɛn,
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Zhakob ghwenakɛ Zhəwda te kema sha Zhozɛf kezha neghe ŋkɛ ŋkɛ mbe Goshɛn. Ma kwa ntsehe hɛ te hɛɗia Goshɛn ne,
Tupurri: Jakob äo' Juda wo pel äe wii Josef ga se yañ go kolge Gosen.

Francais: Lorsque Jacob et les siens furent entrés en Gessen, Joseph fit atteler son char et y monta, pour aller en Gessen, à la rencontre d'Israël, son père. Il se montra à lui et, s'étant jeté à son cou, il pleura longtemps sur son cou.
Anglais: And Joseph made ready his chariot, and went up to meet Israel his father, to Goshen, and presented himself unto him; and he fell on his neck, and wept on his neck a good while.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yosef kot kekena valamu, ɓe kalamu, kay tuɗ hay Gosen, kay ŋaf ir bulum Israyel. Hay li ma iram wi bulumu, nam bowom kelemu, nam tiy ŋolo.
Bulu: a Yôsep a nga tiñeti éwuluwulu jé bikabela a bet e Gôzen, a ke tôban ésaa wé Israél. Ve nné ane a nga yene nye, a nga wubane nye tyiñ , a a nga yôn ayap a tii nye tyiñ .
Guiziga: Zozef a juwa mota ngi pilis naŋ, aru nga Goseŋ, nga pura cine naŋ. Naŋ mupura keɗ si na, a ja kuɓuy, naŋ da ti naŋ kuɓuy, a tuwuy, a tuwuy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yusufu waɗi pucci haa moota muuɗum. O dilli fottoygo bee baaba maako haa Goosan. Nde o yi'i mo, o harli mo daande, o woyi haa neeɓi.
Fulfulde_DC: Yusufu waɗi pucci haa moota muuɗum. O dilli fottoygo bee baaba maako haa Goosan. Nde o yi'i mo, o harli mo daande, o woyi haa neeɓi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jozɛf hɛra nyaŋa tɛ keekee kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ daŋ si Gɔsɛn mɛ we ti dáà kɔ‘i  Israɛl . Ŋgimbi nɛ Jozɛf zɔka dáà kɔ‘i, a̧ hɛra a̧ hi̧i̧ nɛ kɔ̧a̧ ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jozɛf hɛra nyaŋa tɛ keekee kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ daŋ si Gɔsɛn mɛ we ti dáà kɔ‘i  Israɛl . Ŋgimbi nɛ Jozɛf zɔka dáà kɔ‘i, a̧ hɛra a̧ hi̧i̧ nɛ kɔ̧a̧ ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧.
Kapsiki_DC: tarame Zhozɛf pelɛ wəmata gədəwəa ŋkɛ, cape ŋkɛ kadzeme Goshɛn kezha begeme le yitenyɛ. Nakɛma ta ŋkɛ ke yitenyɛ, həməwə ŋkɛ həməwəve ŋkɛ, ntake ŋkɛ kanehwene va zlama katemə kwele kwele, mba hɛ hehəməwə.
Tupurri: Josef kal bañ pus äen ma woge caa pel pan äe Israyele. De maga aà kon no kay mono, aà le' ne hen soole ti ro haçaç haçaç ig wolañ.

Francais: Israël dit à Joseph : " Je puis mourir maintenant, puisque j'ai vu ton visage et que tu vis encore ! "
Anglais: And Israel said unto Joseph, Now let me die, since I have seen thy face, because thou art yet alive.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Israyel di tam Yosef: Wulin kayn nan waŋ iraŋawa, naŋ ka iriya kayn tuta, mitta co ma' kan yo.
Bulu: Yakob a nga jô nye na: Me ntoo wu éyoñe ji, amu me yeneya asu dôé, a na ô ngenan ô vee.
Guiziga: Zakop a ɓaŋ na: «Wurenna, a dirba ya mupura hiri ɗik muduba na, ko da i muc kwa na jam, asi k'ada ti siifa aruŋ.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden Isra'iila wi'i Yusufu: “Jonta kam, nde mi laari yeeso ma, koo mi maayi boo, jam! Ngam a geeto.”
Fulfulde_DC: Nden Isra'iila wi'i Yusufu: “Jonta kam, nde mi laari yeeso ma, koo mi maayi boo, jam! Ngam a geeto.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Israɛl  tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jozɛf: «Ɛ̧ɛ̧ kinii, hee mɔ'ɔ n'am zɔka yí-mɛ ga, mi nyɛma mɛ fe, wen nɛ mɛ duk kpasa!»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Israɛl  tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jozɛf: «Ɛ̧ɛ̧ kinii, hee mɔ'ɔ n'am zɔka yí-mɛ ga, mi nyɛma mɛ fe, wen nɛ mɛ duk kpasa!»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke Zhakob sha Zhozɛf: «Ma tsetsenya kwa nakɛ kema ta ŋa 'ya, ya 'ya mte ɗa ne, nahe, kwa nza ŋkɛ mba na teghweme.»
Tupurri: Israyel wii Josef ga: Daga ndi mo hu mbi patala so. Werga ndi ko nen äo we, ndo yañ mbo caw ëa mono!

Francais: Joseph dit à ses frères et à la famille de son père : " Je vais avertir Pharaon et je lui dirai : Mes frères et la famille de mon père, qui étaient au pays de Chanaan, sont venus vers moi.
Anglais: And Joseph said unto his brethren, and unto his father's house, I will go up, and shew Pharaoh, and say unto him, My brethren, and my father's house, which were in the land of Canaan, are come unto me;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yosef di tam guro-biyomna hiɗi jafna vi bulumu: Nan min tuɗ di tam Farawn ala: Guro-biyonna hiɗi sum sa hay jafna vi bunu sa ay hay nagata Kanaan coowa tan tani.
Bulu: Yôsep a nga jô bobenyañe bé, nda bôt ésaa wé na: Ma zu bete na me ve Faraoñ ayemé, a ma ye jô nye na: Bobejañ a nda bôt ésaa wom e mbe be mbe Kanaan, be soya be ma.
Guiziga: Zozef a ɓa sukum naŋhay ati mizli ngi hay cineheye na: «I ra ɓa ɗaˀ le da buy madiɗa ngi Ezipte, i ra ɓaŋ na: «Sukum ɗuwoy ati mizli ngi hay bahahay misi zleˀe angi hirwuy Kanaˀana, a soko le ng'avi ya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yusufu wi'i deerɗiraaɓe muuɗum e saare baaba muuɗum: “Mi yahan, mi maatina Firawna, mi wi'an mo: Deerɗam'en e saare baaba am, jooɗiiɓeno nder lesdi Kanaana, ngari haa am.
Fulfulde_DC: Yusufu wi'i deerɗiraaɓe muuɗum e saare baaba muuɗum: “Mi yahan, mi maatina Firawna, mi wi'an mo: Deerɗam'en e saare baaba am, jooɗiiɓeno nder lesdi Kanaana, ngari haa am.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Jozɛf tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o nya-wi in ha̧ o bíí nutua ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧: «Mi nɛ̀ɛ́ tɛ wannu Egiptɛ wen mbaŋa tɛ-a'e, o nya'm in o bíí nutua ko dáà kɔ‘m, nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so nú Kanaŋ, pia kpa'm.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Jozɛf tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o nya-wi in ha̧ o bíí nutua ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧: «Mi nɛ̀ɛ́ tɛ wannu Egiptɛ wen mbaŋa tɛ-a'e, o nya'm in o bíí nutua ko dáà kɔ‘m, nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so nú Kanaŋ, pia kpa'm.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke Zhozɛf sha ka kesaka yitenyɛ ba'a mbeli nyi ki ghɛa yitenyɛ: «Katedzeme 'ya kageze nda ke Farawon, ma 'ya shɛ: ‹Nahe ka kesaka yiteyɛ ɗa ba'a mbeli nyi ki ghɛa yitea ɗa nyi kese pelɛ hɛɗia Kanan kesawanji sha 'ya.
Tupurri: Josef wii heçeçre äen wo de jar ni pan äe ga: Ndi wo see Farawoñ ëa, ndi wiin gi ga: Heçeçre äin wo de jar ni pan äi maga hay wo le äi sir Kanaan nduu wo we go see äi la.

Francais: Ces hommes font paître des brebis, car ce sont des propriétaires de troupeaux ; ils ont amené leurs brebis et leurs boeufs, et tout ce qui leur appartient.
Anglais: And the men are shepherds, for their trade hath been to feed cattle; and they have brought their flocks, and their herds, and all that they have.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi si sum sa ŋom fokŋa, nisi wul farayna; nisi co kayn hiɗi fukunayna visiya hiɗi luwayna visiya, hiɗi slena visi noŋ kafe.
Bulu: Bôte bete be ne bebaʼale mbame bone biyem, amu be ne beyale biyem, ba te soo mbame bone biyem a wu beta biyeme miap a biôme bise bi ne émbiap.
Guiziga: I mizli mijiginey, taŋ zlezle ti ginew taŋhaya taˀa. A soko ti tumuŋhoy, ˀaway ati sla taŋhay a haŋ, waɗ gwat taŋhay gar.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yimɓe ɓe'e ɓe waynaaɓe, ɓe ɗon kuuwa kuugal ngaynaaka. Ɓe ngardidi bee dammooji maɓɓe e na'i maɓɓe e ko ɓe mari fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Yimɓe ɓe'e ɓe waynaaɓe, ɓe ɗon kuuwa kuugal ngaynaaka. Ɓe ngardidi bee dammooji maɓɓe e na'i maɓɓe e ko ɓe mari fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi nɔ‘i nɛ́ o wi-dai-mɔ-dai, wen wa zɔk nɛ́ o mɔ-dai ɓɔnsɛnɛ; wa kaia o gasa mɔ-dai in o geɗek-a mbɛt in o mɔ kɔ-wa lɛŋ tɛnɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi nɔ‘i nɛ́ o wi-dai-mɔ-dai, wen wa zɔk nɛ́ o mɔ-dai ɓɔnsɛnɛ; wa kaia o gasa mɔ-dai in o geɗek-a mbɛt in o mɔ kɔ-wa lɛŋ tɛnɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ka ya wəshi mbelia shɛhɛ, wəshi keseɗa ya va hɛ. Nahe hɛ kefəke timɛtia nci, kwia nci, sla ta nci ba'a wəshi nyi va hɛ pɛtɛ.›
Tupurri: Jar sen wo diñ jar koë horoge, werga aà wo de geçeç horoge. AÀ nduu wo de fiiri äaara, de dere äaara wo, de feçeçre äaaran äuy.

Francais: Et quand Pharaon vous appellera et dira : Quelle est votre occupation?
Anglais: And it shall come to pass, when Pharaoh shall call you, and shall say, What is your occupation?
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma Farawn, yigiyawa, la nam jobgiyawa ala:
Bulu: Eyoñ awolo Faraoñ a ye loone mia da ye kui a ye jô na: Bisaé bienan bi ne jé.
Guiziga: Yo da buy madiɗa ngi Ezipte misa zulukum le, da a cufuɗukum le: «Slra kum i mike» na,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: To Firawna ewni on, ƴami on: Ɗume woni kuugal mooɗon? –
Fulfulde_DC: To Firawna ewni on, ƴami on: Ɗume woni kuugal mooɗon? –
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wannu Egiptɛ tɛ sa'nɛ́, mɛ ak'nɛ́‘e, tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ ge tom ge nde,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wannu Egiptɛ tɛ sa'nɛ́, mɛ ak'nɛ́‘e, tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ ge tom ge nde,
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kehekake ŋayɛ Farawon ka'yɛwe slene nya mene yɛ ne,
Tupurri: Day de maga Farawoñ ëege nday wee, day wiigi nday we ga:

Francais: vous répondrez : Nous, tes serviteurs, sommes des propriétaires de troupeaux depuis notre jeunesse jusqu'à présent comme l'étaient nos pères. De cette manière vous habiterez dans le pays de Gessen, car tous les bergers sont en abomination aux Egyptiens. "
Anglais: That ye shall say, Thy servants' trade hath been about cattle from our youth even until now, both we, and also our fathers: that ye may dwell in the land of Goshen; for every shepherd is an abomination unto the Egyptians.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: lopna vigi mi mige ni, nigi ma hotom dit ala: Sa sunda vaŋ wulum mi farayna, tun cawi tam goorta vuma pa ta-ta wulini, numa hiɗi sumayma kafe. Ki kayn nala, nigi ma li ziy hay nagat Gosen, kay sum sa ŋom farayn kayn nisi liwisi kir sum sa Egiptena.
Bulu: Mia ye yalane na: Bebo bisaé bôé be ne beyale biyem, aso bongô a kui den, avale bʼésaa bangan be mbe. Nalé ate e nye mia ye tabe e si ba loone Gôzen, amu bôte yʼEjipte ba vini bebaʼale mimbam mi bone biyem bese.
Guiziga: kisa ɓakaŋ: Ndra gawla ɗikey i mijigina ginewey diga ti zuŋ hã wurenna, ndr'i mijiginey kaɓa dideˀ ndrahay zleˀe. Naɓa kisa cifam a Goseŋ, asi mijigina ginew gar na, Eziptehey a hirsakaŋ.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Mbi'e mo: Maccuɓe ma ɓe waynaaɓe diga nderkaaku amin haa wargo hannde bana kaakiraaɓe amin. Nden on keɓan joonde nder lesdi Goosan, ngam Misra'en ngerdaaki waynaaɓe dammooji.”
Fulfulde_DC: Mbi'e mo: Maccuɓe ma ɓe waynaaɓe diga nderkaaku amin haa wargo hannde bana kaakiraaɓe amin. Nden on keɓan joonde nder lesdi Goosan, ngam Misra'en ngerdaaki waynaaɓe dammooji.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kifi nú: ‹Tom k’ɛɛ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ daia mɔ-dai tɛ ŋgimbi ŋgaiwi k’ɛɛ hɔ nɛnɛ sɔsɔɔ. Ɛ́ɛ́ yá kànà nɛ́ o wi-dai-mɔ-dai hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ o dáà k’ɛɛ yaa so ga.› Hegɔ ɛ́nɛ́ nyɛma mɛ ya sɛn Gɔsɛn wen o be Egiptɛ sɛn o wi-dai-mɔ nyɛmna.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kifi nú: ‹Tom k’ɛɛ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ daia mɔ-dai tɛ ŋgimbi ŋgaiwi k’ɛɛ hɔ nɛnɛ sɔsɔɔ. Ɛ́ɛ́ yá kànà nɛ́ o wi-dai-mɔ-dai hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ o dáà k’ɛɛ yaa so ga.› Hegɔ ɛ́nɛ́ nyɛma mɛ ya sɛn Gɔsɛn wen o be Egiptɛ sɛn o wi-dai-mɔ nyɛmna.»
Kapsiki_DC: ma tezhɛne nda yɛ: ‹Wəshi keseɗa yaya n'yɛ se kaŋwale pa ɓeshi, kala nya se ka shihɛ n'yɛ kaya.› Ma tsagha, waɗe tenza hweŋkwa va gheyɛ kanza te hɛɗia Goshɛn, kwa nza ŋkɛ kaɗe ghena ta ka ya wəshi keseɗa nyi ɓɛhwɛ ɓɛhwɛ ka Ɛzhipte we.»
Tupurri: Joñre äay diñ may la no, ni nday fer wee waçaçre ga: Weere jaçaçre äon hay wo geçeçge diñ horog le ti kleere äaara äaa haçaç patala, wuuri, paçaçre wuur wo. De faage ma sen do sen no kay ni nday lag yañ de tiñ Gosen, werga jar koë horog wo äuy wo diñ jar hoor see jar Ejipte wo.

Francais: Joseph alla porter la nouvelle à Pharaon, en disant : " Mon père et mes frères sont venus du pays de Chanaan avec leurs brebis et leurs boeufs, et tout ce qui leur appartient, et les voici dans le pays de Gessen. "
Anglais: Then Joseph came and told Pharaoh, and said, My father and my brethren, and their flocks, and their herds, and all that they have, are come out of the land of Canaan; and, behold, they are in the land of Goshen.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yosef kaliya, nam di Farawn ala: Guro-biyonna hiɗi bunu coyawa goy hay nagata Kanaan pa, hiɗi fukunayna visiya, hiɗi luwayna visiya hiɗi sle ma ir visin kafe; nisi ka ɗawni hay nagat Gosen.
Bulu: Yôsep a nga ke kate Faraoñ foé a jô nye na: Bobejañ a ésaa wom be soya Kanaan, a mbame bone biyeme wop a wu beta biyeme wop, a biôme bise bi ne émbiap, a e mbe bana be ne Gôzen.
Guiziga: Zozef ara ɓa ɗaˀ le da buy madiɗa ngi Ezipte, a ɓaŋ: «Baha ati sukum ɗuwoy, a soko le baɗ a ruwuy Kanaˀana, ti tumuŋ taŋhay, ˀaw taŋhay, sla taŋhay a haŋ, waɗ gwat taŋhay gar, a roko a ruwuy Goseŋ.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yusufu yehi, anndini Firawna, wi'i mo: “Baaba am e deerɗam'en bee dammooji muuɗum'en e na'i muuɗum'en e mardi muuɗum'en fuu ngari diga lesdi Kanaana. Ndaa, ɓe ɗon nder lesdi Goosan.”
Fulfulde_DC: Yusufu yehi, anndini Firawna, wi'i mo: “Baaba am e deerɗam'en bee dammooji muuɗum'en e na'i muuɗum'en e mardi muuɗum'en fuu ngari diga lesdi Kanaana. Ndaa, ɓe ɗon nder lesdi Goosan.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jozɛf nɛ̀ɛ́ mbaŋ tɛ wannu Egiptɛ, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Dáà kɔ‘m in o nya'm hɔɔ nɛ nú Kanaŋ nɛ̀ mɔ-dai kɔ-wa lɛŋ: o geɗek-a in o gasa-a mbɛt, in o mɔ kɔ-wa lɛŋ. Wa a̧a̧ sɛn nú Gɔsɛn.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jozɛf nɛ̀ɛ́ mbaŋ tɛ wannu Egiptɛ, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Dáà kɔ‘m in o nya'm hɔɔ nɛ nú Kanaŋ nɛ̀ mɔ-dai kɔ-wa lɛŋ: o geɗek-a in o gasa-a mbɛt, in o mɔ kɔ-wa lɛŋ. Wa a̧a̧ sɛn nú Gɔsɛn.»
Kapsiki_DC: Cape Zhozɛf kalə sha Farawon, ma ke shɛ: «Nahe yiteyɛ ɗa ba'a ka kesaka yiteyɛ ɗa kesawa pelɛ hɛɗia Kanan le timɛtia nci, kwia nci, sla ta nci ba'a wəshia nci pɛtɛ. Te hɛɗia Goshɛn hɛ tsetsenya.»
Tupurri: Josef kal woge wii Farawoñ, day waçaç ne hen ga: Heçeçre äin nduu wo we le äi sir Kanaan de pan äi, de fiiri äaaran wo de dere äaaran wo, de feçeçre äaaran wo äuy. AÀ wo wo mo lag äi sir Gosen no.

Francais: Ayant pris cinq de ses frères, il les présenta à Pharaon;
Anglais: And he took some of his brethren, even five men, and presented them unto Pharaoh.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam yaw guro-biyom segeni kuɗum vasl, nam marsi vok Farawn.
Bulu: A nga nyoñe betane ya bobenyañ a zu liti be Faraoñ.
Guiziga: Dar a hil mizli zlum a wuzla sukum naŋhaya, a biga taŋ da buy madiɗa ngi Ezipte.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden o hoo'i njowo caka deerɗiiko'en, o holli ɓe haa Firawna.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden o hoo'i njowo caka deerɗiiko'en, o holli ɓe haa Firawna.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jozɛf mgbɔɔ o ŋma nya-a̧ mɔɔrɔ e ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ɛ̀ usi wa ha̧ wannu Egiptɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jozɛf mgbɔɔ o ŋma nya-a̧ mɔɔrɔ e ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ɛ̀ usi wa ha̧ wannu Egiptɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ, pa Zhozɛf hekake ka kesaka yitenyɛ mcɛfe ba'a ncɛte nda hɛ ke Farawon.
Tupurri: AÀ hoo heçeçre äe po wo dwee wo kañ nen Farawoñ ti äaara.

Francais: et Pharaon leur dit : " Quelle est votre occupation? ": Ils répondirent à Pharaon " Nous, tes serviteurs, sommes bergers, comme l'étaient nos pères. "
Anglais: And Pharaoh said unto his brethren, What is your occupation? And they said unto Pharaoh, Thy servants are shepherds, both we, and also our fathers.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Farawn disiya: Nigi lum mi lop mige? Nisi hot dit mi Farawn ala: Sa sunda vaŋu wulum mi farayna, ki sumayma ay nala kaw.
Bulu: Faraoñ a nga jô bobenyañ be Yôsep na: Za avale bisaé mia bo? Be nga yalane na: Bebo bisaé bôé be ne bebaʼale mbame bone biyem, avale bʼésaa bangan be mbe.
Guiziga: Buy madiɗa ngi Ezipte a ɓa sukum ngi Zozefey tuwa: «Slra kum i mike?» A mbiɗakaŋ di: «Ndra gawla ɗikey i mijiginey, ndr'i mijiginey kaɓa dideˀ ndrahay zleˀe.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Firawna ƴami deerɗiraaɓe Yusufu: “Ɗume woni kuugal mooɗon?” Ɓe njaabani Firawna: “Maccuɓe ma ngoni waynaaɓe dammooji, bana kaakiraaɓe amin.”
Fulfulde_DC: Firawna ƴami deerɗiraaɓe Yusufu: “Ɗume woni kuugal mooɗon?” Ɓe njaabani Firawna: “Maccuɓe ma ngoni waynaaɓe dammooji, bana kaakiraaɓe amin.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu Egiptɛ aka o nya Jozɛf: «Tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ ge tom ge?» Ɓɛɛ wa kifi nú ha̧ wannu Egiptɛ: «Tom k’ɛɛ, wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ daia o mɔ-dai; ɛ́ɛ́ nɛ́ o wi-dai-mɔ-dai hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ o dáà k’ɛɛ yaa so ga.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu Egiptɛ aka o nya Jozɛf: «Tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ ge tom ge?» Ɓɛɛ wa kifi nú ha̧ wannu Egiptɛ: «Tom k’ɛɛ, wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ daia o mɔ-dai; ɛ́ɛ́ nɛ́ o wi-dai-mɔ-dai hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ o dáà k’ɛɛ yaa so ga.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke Farawon sha hɛ: «Wa slene nya mene yɛ wa?» Ma ke hɛ zhɛnete nda: «Meghea n'yɛ, ka ya wəshi keseɗa nyi ɓɛhwɛ ɓɛhwɛ ghen'yɛ kala nya se ka shihɛ n'yɛ kaya.»
Tupurri: Farawoñ wii ra ga: Joñre äay diñ mayla? AÀ kal wo fer waçaçre ne Farawoñ ga: Weere jaçaçre äon wo diñ jar koë horog do maga paçaçre wuur hay wo le wurpo nono.

Francais: Ils dirent encore à Pharaon : " Nous sommes venus pour séjourner dans le pays, car il n'y a plus de pâture pour les brebis de tes serviteurs, la famine s'étant appesantie sur le pays de Chanaan. Permets donc à tes serviteurs d'habiter dans le pays de Gessen. "
Anglais: They said moreover unto Pharaoh, For to sojourn in the land are we come; for thy servants have no pasture for their flocks; for the famine is sore in the land of Canaan: now therefore, we pray thee, let thy servants dwell in the land of Goshen.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi di tam Farawn lo: Numa co kayni kay li ziy hay nagata vaŋu, kay hatna ma farayna vuma ti'e may ɗawayni hay nagat Kanaan loɗi, kay dalan ka li ŋolo hay nagat Kanaan. Nala naŋ ma malma hagata kay nema ma lak ɗawni hay nagat Gosen.
Bulu: Be nga beta jô Faraoñ na: Bi ne nsoone ya bo mintabe e si jôé, amu teke fe bidi ya di asu mbame bone biyem bebo bisaé bôé, amu zaé ja jeme mvé e Kanaan; vaʼa ñhe ngule na bebo bisaé bôé be tabe e Gôzen.
Guiziga: A ɓaka buy madiɗa ngi Ezipte na: «I soko ɓa i zikam neˀ aka, asi may ara bul vu asi ruwuy Kanaˀana, yo gwat ngi zum ngi ginewey anta mata. Pula jiviɗ da ndra gawla ɗikeye, ɓa a cifam wurenna a Goseŋ.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe mbi'i Firawna fahin: “Min ngari haa min koɗa nder lesdi maaɗa. Durduɗe ngoodaa ngam dammooji maccuɓe ma, ngam weelo saati nder lesdi Kanaana. Accu maccuɓe ma njooɗo jonta nder lesdi Goosan.”
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe mbi'i Firawna fahin: “Min ngari haa min koɗa nder lesdi maaɗa. Durduɗe ngoodaa ngam dammooji maccuɓe ma, ngam weelo saati nder lesdi Kanaana. Accu maccuɓe ma njooɗo jonta nder lesdi Goosan.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ ha̧ wannu Egiptɛ woyo: «Ɛ́ɛ́ kura pii hɛ̧ɛ̧, wen o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ bo so nɛ̀ zɔ̧ wen o mɔ-dai kɔ-wa ɓɔna, wen kaɓa baa nú Kanaŋ lɛŋ. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é yuwar ha̧ o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ba fara sɛn Gɔsɛn.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ ha̧ wannu Egiptɛ woyo: «Ɛ́ɛ́ kura pii hɛ̧ɛ̧, wen o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ bo so nɛ̀ zɔ̧ wen o mɔ-dai kɔ-wa ɓɔna, wen kaɓa baa nú Kanaŋ lɛŋ. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é yuwar ha̧ o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ba fara sɛn Gɔsɛn.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke hɛ sha Farawon: «Ghen'yɛ se kanza te hɛɗia ŋa, kwa nza ŋkɛ kaɗema gwəzə shɛ kezha timɛtia n'yɛ ba'a kwele kwele ma te hɛɗia Kanan. Pelave n'yɛ hweŋkwa kanza te hɛɗia Goshɛn gi.»
Tupurri: AÀ wii wo Farawoñ pa ga: Wuur aà diñ ma joñge go äi sir la, werga haçaç maga horog reen wo bay wa so, werga koñnen de paçaç sir Kanaan. Men weere jaçaçre äon mo lag wo de tiñ äi sir Gosene.

Francais: Pharaon dit à Joseph : " Ton père et tes frères sont venus auprès de toi. Le pays d'Égypte est devant toi: établis ton père et tes frères dans la meilleure partie du pays.
Anglais: And Pharaoh spake unto Joseph, saying, Thy father and thy brethren are come unto thee:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Farawn di tam Yosef: Buŋu hiɗi guro-biyoŋŋa co kayn kataŋ naŋu.
Bulu: Faraoñ a nga jô Yôsep na: Esoo a bobenyoñ ba te zu be wo.
Guiziga: Buy madiɗa ngi Ezipte a ɓa Zozefe: «Bunuk ati sukum ɗikey a soko le ng'avi ka.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: __Error__
Fulfulde_DC: __Error__
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu Egiptɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jozɛf: «Kinii o nya-mɛ in dáà kɔ-mɛ pia zu mɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu Egiptɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jozɛf: «Kinii o nya-mɛ in dáà kɔ-mɛ pia zu mɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke Farawon sha Zhozɛf: «Nahe yiteyɛ ŋa ba'a ka kesaka yiteyɛ ŋa kesawanji sha gha.
Tupurri: Farawoñ wii Josef ga: Pan äo wo de heçeçre äon nduu wo äiñ äo.

Francais: Qu'ils demeurent dans le pays de Gessen; et, si tu trouves parmi eux des hommes capables, mets-les à la tête des troupeaux qui m'appartiennent. "
Anglais: The land of Egypt is before thee; in the best of the land make thy father and brethren to dwell; in the land of Goshen let them dwell: and if thou knowest any men of activity among them, then make them rulers over my cattle.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nagat Egipte ka vokaŋ hiriŋ-hiriŋ'; naŋ ma lak buŋu hiɗi guro-biyoŋŋa hay liyn ma ŋaana vi nagata. Hinsi lak hay nagat Gosen, la naŋ fi sum sa nagayn jarsiya, naŋ tunsi kay ŋoman farayna van lay.
Bulu: Si yʼEjipte é ne e mo môé; toʼé ésoo a bobenyoñ éfase si ja dañ abeñ. Be tabeʼe e Gôzen; a, nge wo yeme na bôte ya tabe be ndi be ne be be, teléʼé be ane bejôô mimbame biyeme miam.
Guiziga: Hirwuy Ezipte naŋ asi haŋ ɗiki, cifa ti bunuk ati sukum ɗikeye ar li mezleŋ wãˀ. Anja a cifam a Goseŋ. Da ki sin mizli mindilaka le ngi gi gwata a wuzla taŋ na, cifa taŋ i buyɓi ngi ginew ɗuwoy.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: __Error__
Fulfulde_DC: __Error__
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nù'ɛ nɛ́ kɔ-mɛ, mɛ̀ é o nya-mɛ in dáà kɔ-mɛ tɛ de fara nɛ gana o dɔka-a. Wa a̧ de ye tɛ nú Gɔsɛn. Kà mɛ nɛ́ iŋa o ŋma mgbara wa nɛ nyɛma mɛ de kpasamɔ, mɛ̀ á wa nɛ o wi-dai-mɔ-dai kɔ‘m.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nù'ɛ nɛ́ kɔ-mɛ, mɛ̀ é o nya-mɛ in dáà kɔ-mɛ tɛ de fara nɛ gana o dɔka-a. Wa a̧ de ye tɛ nú Gɔsɛn. Kà mɛ nɛ́ iŋa o ŋma mgbara wa nɛ nyɛma mɛ de kpasamɔ, mɛ̀ á wa nɛ o wi-dai-mɔ-dai kɔ‘m.»
Kapsiki_DC: Te dzeve ta ŋa pɛtɛa hɛɗia Ɛzhipte, veyi yiteyɛ ŋa ba'a ka kesaka yiteyɛ ŋa te ŋkwa nya ganyɛ. Wərə hɛ kanzanji te hɛɗia Goshɛn. Ma kesləyi ka katsala kɛfi na hwa hɛ, veyi hɛ te ghəa ŋa ɗa wəshi keseɗa.»
Tupurri: Sir Ejipte wo pel äo mo ti' no. Lag pan äo wo de heçeçre äon wo ti ngeel maga de wore äi sirn lam no. Daga aà mo lag wo mbaara äi sir Gosen. Day hayga ndo da' jar maga wo de kaçaçge yañ yoo äaara ni no, ni ndo kañ ra koë horog äin wo no.

Francais: Joseph fit venir Jacob, son père, et le présenta à Pharaon. Jacob bénit Pharaon ;
Anglais: And Joseph brought in Jacob his father, and set him before Pharaoh: and Jacob blessed Pharaoh.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yosef mar bulum Yakub, nam tuɗum tam Farawn, Yakub gi bol kay Farawn.
Bulu: Yôsep a nga zuu ésaa a liti nye Faraoñ; a Yakob a nga botane Faraoñ.
Guiziga: Zozef a so ti cine naŋ Zakopo, a biga da buy madiɗa ngi Ezipte, Zakop a ɗuwula mi da buy Ezipte.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden Yusufu waddi baaba muuɗum Yaakubu, holli mo Firawna. Yaakubu barkiɗini Firawna.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden Yusufu waddi baaba muuɗum Yaakubu, holli mo Firawna. Yaakubu barkiɗini Firawna.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jozɛf mgbɔɔ dáà kɔ‘i nɛ́ɛ̀ usi ha̧ wannu Egiptɛ, ɓɛɛ Jakob tok de yoŋgo zu wannu.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jozɛf mgbɔɔ dáà kɔ‘i nɛ́ɛ̀ usi ha̧ wannu Egiptɛ, ɓɛɛ Jakob tok de yoŋgo zu wannu.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Zhozɛf keleghe yitenyɛ Zhakob ba'a ncɛte nda ŋkɛ ke Farawon. Pa Zhakob njiŋwakɛ Farawon le hawe.
Tupurri: Josef kal baa pan äe le kal kañ nen Farawoñ ti äe. Jakob kal kañ bosa' ne Farawoñ ti.

Francais: et Pharaon dit à Jacob : " Quel est le nombre de jours des années de ta vie? "
Anglais: And Pharaoh said unto Jacob, How old art thou?
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Farawn di tam Yakub: Busata vaŋ liy noŋ pet gaage?
Bulu: Faraoñ a nga jô Yakob na: Mimbu yʼényiñe jôé mi ne miañembé?
Guiziga: Buy Ezipte a ɓaŋ: «Ka ti vi kite ka?»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Firawna ƴami Yaakubu: “Noy duuɓi ma?”
Fulfulde_DC: Firawna ƴami Yaakubu: “Noy duuɓi ma?”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu Egiptɛ aka a̧: «Mɛ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ ge?»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu Egiptɛ aka a̧: «Mɛ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ ge?»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke Farawon shɛ: «Ŋkwini va ta ŋa wa?»
Tupurri: Farawoñ wii Jakob ga: Kiñgi maga ndo de joñge äe caw mono gaçy ne?

Francais: Jacob répondit à Pharaon : " Les jours des années de mon pèlerinage sont de cent trente ans. Courts et mauvais ont été les jours des années de ma vie, et ils n'ont point atteint les jours des années de la vie de mes pères durant leur pèlerinage. "
Anglais: And Jacob said unto Pharaoh, The days of the years of my pilgrimage are an hundred and thirty years: few and evil have the days of the years of my life been, and have not attained unto the days of the years of the life of my fathers in the days of their pilgrimage.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yakub hot dit mi Farawn ala: Busata van ta nan poy gaa kay nagat noŋ pet co kis hiɗi diram dok-ɦidi. Busata van ta nan la' gaa kay nagat may li ŋolɗi lay na' li joo'o lay, na' may ŋra hiɗi busata ta sumiyan la' gaa kay nagat tan noŋɗi.
Bulu: Yakob a nga yalane Faraoñ na: Mimbu mi ényiñe jam tee ngum étabaʼa mi ne 130. Mimbu yʼényiñe jam mi mbe étun a abé , mi nji ke kui mimbu mi ényiñe bʼésaa bam, e nté be nga nyiñ tee ngum étabaʼa.
Guiziga: Zakop a mbiɗaŋ di: «Ya maru ti slikiɗ aka akaka na, vi ɗu ani skat ti kukur makir. Vi ɗu a cuh kutum, yo i vi mutuwaˀhay ma, a ndila vi ngi dideˀ ɗuwoy mizikam ar li slikiɗ aka akaka na ta.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yaakubu jaabi: “Duuɓi ngeendam koɗamku am haa duniyaaru ngaɗi teemerre e cappanɗe tati (130). Duuɓi ngeendam am ɗi caɗɗi, ɗi ɗuuɗaay. Ɗi njottaaki duuɓi ngeendam kaakiraaɓe am nder koɗamku maɓɓe.”
Fulfulde_DC: Yaakubu jaabi: “Duuɓi ngeendam koɗamku am haa duniyaaru ngaɗi teemerre e cappanɗe tati (130). Duuɓi ngeendam am ɗi caɗɗi, ɗi ɗuuɗaay. Ɗi njottaaki duuɓi ngeendam kaakiraaɓe am nder koɗamku maɓɓe.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ Jakob kifi nú: «Dee nɛ́ pɛ gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-taar n'am yar nɛnɛ zu nù nɛnɛ hee gɛnɛ ga; ɗoŋ duka-kpasa kɔ‘m nyɛi̧ na, in mi zɔka bɔnɛ nyɛmna. Mi kpa pɛ hee ko o zɔmdáa kɔ‘m nɛ yaa zu nù hee o gɛnɛ ga na mbɛt.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ Jakob kifi nú: «Dee nɛ́ pɛ gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-taar n'am yar nɛnɛ zu nù nɛnɛ hee gɛnɛ ga; ɗoŋ duka-kpasa kɔ‘m nyɛi̧ na, in mi zɔka bɔnɛ nyɛmna. Mi kpa pɛ hee ko o zɔmdáa kɔ‘m nɛ yaa zu nù hee o gɛnɛ ga na mbɛt.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke Zhakob zhɛnete nda: «Va gwəmsə ba'a mahekenemsə ghala dzedzeghwa 'ya kehɛɗi kehɛɗi kala nde se se. Kahe kahe hale ɗa 'ya ba'a dzawe sahwe yaka 'ya. Kekekave va ta ka shihɛ ɗa nyi kese kadzedzeghwa 'ya we.»
Tupurri: Jakob kal fer waçaçre ne Farawoñ ga: Kiñgi maga ndi de rañge de äe mo caw aà kis ti äe do swa'a. Kiñgi maga ndi joñn mo caw aà bay pur wa lay, se de gaali lay, aà day mani paçaçre äi maga hay joñ mbaara mo sug ti seele sen do sen no lay gaa äuy.

Francais: Jacob bénit encore Pharaon et se retira de devant Pharaon.
Anglais: And Jacob blessed Pharaoh, and went out from before Pharaoh.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yakub gi bol kay Farawn mara lo, bugolda nam vi tuwam goy vok ir Farawn.
Bulu: Yakob a nga beta botane Faraoñ a kôlô vôm a mbe.
Guiziga: A dirba Zakop muɗuwula mi da buy Ezipte na, a cuh gwat naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yaakubu barkiɗini Firawna, nden o wurti diga laamorde.
Fulfulde_DC: Yaakubu barkiɗini Firawna, nden o wurti diga laamorde.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jakob toka de yoŋgo zu wannu Egiptɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ war a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jakob toka de yoŋgo zu wannu Egiptɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ war a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Zhakob zhɛne kanjiŋwakɛ Farawon, cape ŋkɛ shave ki ghɛa meghe.
Tupurri: Jakob kal kañ bosa' ne Farawoñ ti tigriñ, kal mbe naa see äe go pel Farawoñ so.

Francais: Joseph établit son père et ses frères, et leur assigna une propriété dans le pays d'Égypte, dans la meilleure partie du pays, dans la contrée de Ramsès, ainsi que Pharaon l'avait ordonné ;
Anglais: And Joseph placed his father and his brethren, and gave them a possession in the land of Egypt, in the best of the land, in the land of Rameses, as Pharaoh had commanded.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yosef vul liyn ma lakka mi bulum hiɗi guro-biyomna hay nagat Egipte, nam vulsi liyn ma ir visiya hay nagat Egipte, hay gal ma ŋaana vi nagata, hay galla vi Ramses, kayni ki Farawn vul hagat nala.
Bulu: Yôsep a nga jéé ésaa a bobenyañe bé éto, a nga ve be ngabe si e si yʼEjipte, éfase si ja dañ abeñ, e sii Ramzés, avale Faraoñ a nga bendé.
Guiziga: Zozef a vula li cifi da cine ati sukum naŋhaya, a vula taŋ li mimezleŋ muwãˀ ngi ruwuy Ezipte, tir vay Ramses, kaɓa buy Ezipte miɓaŋ di.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yusufu jo'ini baaba mum e deerɗum'en haa nokkuure ɓurnde wooɗugo haa Misra, lesdi Ra'meses, bana Firawna umruno.
Fulfulde_DC: Yusufu jo'ini baaba mum e deerɗum'en haa nokkuure ɓurnde wooɗugo haa Misra, lesdi Ra'meses, bana Firawna umruno.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jozɛf usa fara-duk ha̧ dáà kɔ‘i in ha̧ o nya-wi, ɓɛɛ a̧ usi nɛ́ de fara ha̧ wa sɛn Egiptɛ tɛ nù ko Ramsɛs, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wannu Egiptɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ga.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jozɛf usa fara-duk ha̧ dáà kɔ‘i in ha̧ o nya-wi, ɓɛɛ a̧ usi nɛ́ de fara ha̧ wa sɛn Egiptɛ tɛ nù ko Ramsɛs, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wannu Egiptɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ga.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Zhozɛf veyi yitenyɛ ba'a ka kesaka yitenyɛ te ŋkwa nya ganyɛ mbe Ɛzhipte, te hɛɗia Ramsɛs kala nya gezete nda Farawon. Pa ŋkɛ ndeke nda hɛɗi ke hɛ kaŋa nci.
Tupurri: Josef kal lag pan äe wo de heçeçre äen wo, haç ngeel ma äaara ne hara äi sir Ejipte ti äañ ngeel ma de wore äi sir no, wo nen ti coçoç ngeel ma Ramses do maga Farawoñ hay waçaçn go nono.

Francais: et Joseph fournit de pain son père et ses frères, et toute la famille de son père, selon le nombre des enfants.
Anglais: And Joseph nourished his father, and his brethren, and all his father's household, with bread, according to their families.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yosef vul sle ma tina mi bulumu hiɗi guro-biyomna, hiɗi sa fi bulumna noŋ kafe, nam vulum kuɗ ŋaɓta vi gurosgurayna.
Bulu: Yôsep a nga ve biôm asu mebelan mʼésaa wé, me bobenyañe bé, me nda bôt ésaa wé ése, aval ane tañe bon é mbe.
Guiziga: Zozef a vula gwat ngi zum da cine ati sukum naŋhaya, waɗ da mizli ngi hay cineheye gar, weˀe avu hay ngi mburo ngi mburo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yusufu hokki baaba mum e deerɗum'en e saare baaba mum fuu nguure fodde limgal ɓikkoy.
Fulfulde_DC: Yusufu hokki baaba mum e deerɗum'en e saare baaba mum fuu nguure fodde limgal ɓikkoy.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jozɛf ha̧a̧ o nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ dáà kɔ‘i, ha̧ o nya kɔ‘i gu nɛ o bíí nutua ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o geɗek bem nɛ a̧a̧ sɛn er wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jozɛf ha̧a̧ o nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ dáà kɔ‘i, ha̧ o nya kɔ‘i gu nɛ o bíí nutua ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o geɗek bem nɛ a̧a̧ sɛn er wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Zhozɛf fəave nda wəshi kezeme ke yɛ yitenyɛ, ka kesaka yitenyɛ ba'a mbeli nyi ki ghɛa yitenyɛ pɛtɛ kala nza ta ŋwale nyi va hɛ kazeme nda zeme.
Tupurri: Josef kal haç reege ne pan äe de heçeçre äen wo, de jar mani pan äen wo äuy, see ngaäa weeren wo no.

Francais: Il n'y avait plus de pain dans tout le pays, car la famine était très grande ; le pays d'Égypte et le pays de Chanaan étaient épuisés à cause de la famine.
Anglais: And there was no bread in all the land; for the famine was very sore, so that the land of Egypt and all the land of Canaan fainted by reason of the famine.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay nagat noŋ kaf sle ma tin mayɗi, kay dalan ka li ŋolo; sum sa hay nagat Egipte hiɗi sum sa hay nagat Kanaan noŋ kaf donota visi vatay goyo kay mayta.
Bulu: Belet ya di é nji fe beta bo Ejipte ése, amu mfumbale zaé a mbe étua adit; Ejipte a Kanaan be nga wu amu mfumbale zaé.
Guiziga: May a bul vu le asi ruwuy gar, gwat ngi zum anta mata. Hirwuy Ezipte ati Kanaˀana, a sinaka a gam kini avu may nah mata.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nyaamdu woodaa nder duniyaaru fuu, ngam weelo saati masin. Yimɓe lesdi Misra e lesdi Kanaana ɗonno tampa ngam weelo.
Fulfulde_DC: Nyaamdu woodaa nder duniyaaru fuu, ngam weelo saati masin. Yimɓe lesdi Misra e lesdi Kanaana ɗonno tampa ngam weelo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nyɔŋmɔ ɓana zaŋnu lɛŋ, wen kaɓa baa nù nyɛmna. Nú Egiptɛ in nú Kanaŋ iŋ mɔ nɛ wa tɛ de ŋgimbi kaɓa'i ɓɔna.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nyɔŋmɔ ɓana zaŋnu lɛŋ, wen kaɓa baa nù nyɛmna. Nú Egiptɛ in nú Kanaŋ iŋ mɔ nɛ wa tɛ de ŋgimbi kaɓa'i ɓɔna.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe ma kenza dzawe kwa nahe wəshi kezeme te hɛɗi pɛtɛ. Pahe yapahe mbeli nyi te hɛɗia Ɛzhipte ba'a nyi te hɛɗia Kanan va ma shɛ.
Tupurri: Reege hay bay äi sir wa so äuy, werga koñnen hay kluu debañ. Sir Kanaan wo de sir Ejipte hay wo go de gayre do koñnen debañ.

Francais: Joseph recueillit tout l'argent qui se trouvait dans le pays d'Égypte et dans le pays de Chanaan, contre le blé qu'on achetait, et il fit entrer cet argent dans la maison de Pharaon.
Anglais: And Joseph gathered up all the money that was found in the land of Egypt, and in the land of Canaan, for the corn which they bought: and Joseph brought the money into Pharaoh's house.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yosef tok gurjuta ta ka hay nagat Kanaan hiɗi nagat Egipte kafe, nam toka' hiɗi wa-alkamare ma sumun ka gusumna; gurju na'ta nam kala' vo hay ziyna vi Farawn.
Bulu: Yôsep a nga toʼé moné ase a mbe Ejipte a e Kanaan, mvol a fôn ése be mbe be Kusuk; a nga bo na be nyiñeli moné ate e nda Faraoñ.
Guiziga: Dala ngisi ruwuy Ezipte ati ngi Kanaˀan gar na, a ci le ng'asi haŋ Zozef ti taŋ mahiɗikam daw ava tuwa. A co ti dala le cek ng'ar mugum ngi buy Ezipte.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yusufu mooɓti ceede gonɗe haa Misra e Kanaana fuu, ngam alkamaari ndi yimɓe coodi. O waddi ceede man nder saare Firawna.
Fulfulde_DC: Yusufu mooɓti ceede gonɗe haa Misra e Kanaana fuu, ngam alkamaari ndi yimɓe coodi. O waddi ceede man nder saare Firawna.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jozɛf mɔi̧a sede nú Egiptɛ in nú Kanaŋ lɛŋ nɛ̀ o bíí hi̧fa so nɛ nyɔŋmɔ a fara-a-sede ko wannu Egiptɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jozɛf mɔi̧a sede nú Egiptɛ in nú Kanaŋ lɛŋ nɛ̀ o bíí hi̧fa so nɛ nyɔŋmɔ a fara-a-sede ko wannu Egiptɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pɛtɛ Zhozɛf tsenehwe cɛdɛ nyi te hɛɗia Ɛzhipte ba'a nyi te hɛɗia Kanan nyi pave ha mbeli te, beteyi ki ghɛa Farawon.
Tupurri: Josef baa jag solay maga hay äi sir Ejipte wo de sir Kanaan mo deñ äuy go, ti coore ble maga aà hay yeëge äe mono. AÀ kal laa solay sen mokay liñ ni Farawoñ.

Francais: Quand il n'y eut plus d'argent dans le pays d'Égypte et dans le pays de Chanaan, tous les Egyptiens vinrent à Joseph, en disant: " Donne-nous du pain! Pourquoi mourrions-nous en ta présence? Car nous sommes à bout d'argent. " Joseph dit :
Anglais: And when money failed in the land of Egypt, and in the land of Canaan, all the Egyptians came unto Joseph, and said, Give us bread: for why should we die in thy presence? for the money faileth.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma gurjuta vi sum sa hay Egipte hiɗi sum sa hay Kanaan kaf vatawa goyo, sum sa Egipten kaf co tam Yosef, nisi dumu: Vulma fuwa, naŋ hinma mit vok iraŋ ɗawn nanige? Kay gurjut tay loɗi.
Bulu: Eyoñe moné yʼEjipte a nyô ya Kanaan a nga man, bôte bese yʼEjipte be nga zu be Yôsep be jôʼô na: Vaʼa bia belet! Ye bia yiane wu ô too amu na moné a jeñemban?
Guiziga: Dala a kiɗ hilfa le wãˀ angi hirwuy Ezipte ati Kanaˀana. Mizli Eziptehey gar a soko ngavi Zozefe, a ɓakaŋ: «Vula ndra gwat ngi zum. Anja mbak i micam vur dala anta avu ndra ta si sukwa?»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ceede timmi nder lesdi Misra e lesdi Kanaana. Misra'en fuu ngari haa Yusufu, mbi'i: “Hokku min ko min nyaama. Min maaya yeeso ma ngam ceede timmi na?”
Fulfulde_DC: Ceede timmi nder lesdi Misra e lesdi Kanaana. Misra'en fuu ngari haa Yusufu, mbi'i: “Hokku min ko min nyaama. Min maaya yeeso ma ngam ceede timmi na?”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ sede kaɗa sɛn nú Egiptɛ in nú Kanaŋ kaɗi, o be Egiptɛ lɛŋ mɔi̧a ŋmaa tɛ́ɛ̀ kpa Jozɛf, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ nyɔŋmɔ h’ɛ́ɛ́! Ɛ́ɛ́ tɛ fe ti'nɛ́ wen nɛ sede bo na nde?»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ sede kaɗa sɛn nú Egiptɛ in nú Kanaŋ kaɗi, o be Egiptɛ lɛŋ mɔi̧a ŋmaa tɛ́ɛ̀ kpa Jozɛf, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ nyɔŋmɔ h’ɛ́ɛ́! Ɛ́ɛ́ tɛ fe ti'nɛ́ wen nɛ sede bo na nde?»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa ɗema cɛdɛ mba te hɛɗia Ɛzhipte ba'a te hɛɗia Kanan, hwa'a ka Ɛzhipte sha Zhozɛf, ma ke hɛ shɛ: «Ɗave n'yɛ wəshi kezeme gi. Mpə n'yɛ n'yɛ va ma kwa kema ta ŋa kwa ɗema cɛdɛ mba va ghen'yɛ gɛ na?»
Tupurri: De maga solay ma äi sir Ejipte wo de ma äi sir Kanaan leë wo jag go mono, jar Ejipte kal wo nduugi äiñ Josef ga: Haç reege ne wuuri! Wuur mo laä mbe go pel äo diñ werga solay bay do wuur wa bla?

Francais: " Amenez vos troupeaux, et je vous donnerai du pain en échange de vos troupeaux, puisque vous êtes à bout d'argent."
Anglais: And Joseph said, Give your cattle; and I will give you for your cattle, if money fail.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yosef di'e: La gurjut tay kigi loɗi, nigi maran farayna vigiyaya, nan min gusum hiɗi wa-alkamarena.
Bulu: Yôsep nye na: Vaʼane mimbame biyeme mienan a ma ye ve mia belet, mvol a biyeme bienan, mbôlô moné a jeñemban.
Guiziga: Zozef a mbiɗa taŋ di: «Da dala anta avu kumo mata na, vulikiy ginew kumoy na, i sa vulukum gwat ngi zumo weˀe avu cikili ngi ginew kumoyo.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yusufu wi'i ɓe: “Ngadde dabbaaji mooɗon. Mi hokkan on nyaamdu mbattudi dabbaaji mon, ngam ceede mooɗon timmi.”
Fulfulde_DC: Yusufu wi'i ɓe: “Ngadde dabbaaji mooɗon. Mi hokkan on nyaamdu mbattudi dabbaaji mon, ngam ceede mooɗon timmi.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ Jozɛf tɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Kà sede á̧ boo na, ɛ̀nɛ̀ káí o mɔ-dai k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛnɛ, wen hi̧fa-a nɛ nyɔŋmɔ.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ Jozɛf tɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Kà sede á̧ boo na, ɛ̀nɛ̀ káí o mɔ-dai k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛnɛ, wen hi̧fa-a nɛ nyɔŋmɔ.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke Zhozɛf zhɛnete: «Ma keɗema cɛdɛ mba va gheyɛ ne, kese ɗa mə wəshi keseɗa ta ŋayɛ nda teɗa ŋayɛ wəshi kezeme 'ya.»
Tupurri: Josef ga: Bag wee horog äayn wo le, ndi haç mbi reege yañ ne nday ti horog äayn wo no, hayga solay bay we wa no.

Francais: Ils amenèrent leurs troupeaux à Joseph, et Joseph leur donna du pain en échange des chevaux, des troupeaux de brebis et de boeufs, et des ânes. Il leur fournit ainsi du pain cette année-là, en échange de tous leurs troupeaux.
Anglais: And they brought their cattle unto Joseph: and Joseph gave them bread in exchange for horses, and for the flocks, and for the cattle of the herds, and for the asses: and he fed them with bread for all their cattle for that year.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi mar farayna visi mi Yosef, Yosef vulsi sle ma tin baŋal kulumayna visiya, baŋal fukunayna hiɗi luwayna, hiɗi kurona. Hay busat na'ta kaf nisi gus sle ma tin kalamu hiɗi farayna visiya.
Bulu: Be nga soo biyeme biap be Yôsep, a Yôsep a nga ve be belet, mvol a bikabela, mimbam mi bone biyem a beta biyem, a bijakas. Nalé ate a nga ve be belet mbu ôte mvol a mimbame biyeme miap mise.
Guiziga: Dar a soko ti ginew taŋhaya: Pilisey, tumuŋhoy, ˀaway, slahay ati zunguhoyo, nga mbiɗi di gwat ngi zum avu Zozefe. Zozef a vula taŋ gwat ngi zum ngi vi nah, weˀe avu cikili ngi ginew taŋhay gar.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ngaddani Yusufu dabbaaji maɓɓe. Yusufu hokki ɓe nyaamdu mbattudi pucci e dammooji e na'i e bamɗe maɓɓe. Nder hitaande nde'e o nyaamni ɓe mbattudi dabbaaji maɓɓe fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ngaddani Yusufu dabbaaji maɓɓe. Yusufu hokki ɓe nyaamdu mbattudi pucci e dammooji e na'i e bamɗe maɓɓe. Nder hitaande nde'e o nyaamni ɓe mbattudi dabbaaji maɓɓe fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ wa kai o mɔ-dai kɔ-wa tɛnɛ ha̧ Jozɛf, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ wa nyɛm nɛ gɛnɛ mɔ-dai: o nyaŋa, o ndai, o sami, o gbadua ká bá nɛ̀ o tuifuu. Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ o bíí kpaa nɛ nyɔŋmɔ tɛ pɛ‘i, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ-dai kɔ-wa nɛ wa ha̧a̧ lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ wa kai o mɔ-dai kɔ-wa tɛnɛ ha̧ Jozɛf, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ wa nyɛm nɛ gɛnɛ mɔ-dai: o nyaŋa, o ndai, o sami, o gbadua ká bá nɛ̀ o tuifuu. Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ o bíí kpaa nɛ nyɔŋmɔ tɛ pɛ‘i, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ-dai kɔ-wa nɛ wa ha̧a̧ lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hɛ keseke nda wəshi keseɗa ta nci ke Zhozɛf. Pa Zhozɛf ɗave nda wəshi kezeme ke hɛ te gədəwəa lɛməa nci, timɛti, kwi, sla ba'a kwara lɛməa nci. Kala nza ta səkəməa wəshi keseɗa ta nci ɗave nda wəshi kezeme Zhozɛf ke hɛ wərə zeme ta nci te va shɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ kal wo hoor horog äaaran wo le, Josef kal haç reege ne hara ti piiri äaaran wo, ti fiiri äaaran wo de dere äaaran wo, ti gerheçeç äaaran wo. AÀ kal haç reege ne hara kal sen ti horog äaaran wo äuy.

Francais: Lorsque cette année fut écoulée, ils vinrent à Joseph l'année suivante, et lui dirent : " Nous ne cacherons point à mon seigneur que l'argent est épuisé et que les troupeaux de bétail ont été donnés à mon seigneur ; il ne reste devant mon seigneur que nos corps et nos terres.
Anglais: When that year was ended, they came unto him the second year, and said unto him, We will not hide it from my lord, how that our money is spent; my lord also hath our herds of cattle; there is not ought left in the sight of my lord, but our bodies, and our lands:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma busata na'ta kalawa, nisi co tam Yosef hay busata vokka lo, nisi dumu: Sam-ŋolla, wulin kayn numa as ŋayaŋ loɗi, gurju tay kuma loɗi, farayna numa kalaŋgiyawa goy kafe, wulin hini hay ɓuma kayn ti nagata hiɗi tuwma vuɗin may tuta.
Bulu: Eyoñe mbu ôte ô maneya, be nga zu be nye, e mbu ô nga tôñe valé, a jô nye na: Bia ye bo te solé masa na moné a maneya, a na bi nga soo masa mimbame biyem, a liʼiya bia, asu masa, ve menyôle mangan a mesi mangan.
Guiziga: Vi nah a cuh, vi mekelem ma na, a sa lumaka Zozefe, a ɓakaŋ: «Dala anta mata, yo ginewey ati gwat misãmihey i ngi ɗikey buy. Ndr'anta ɗumoko a mbuŋ ɗike ta, mindira ndra sey dumvu ndra ati guva ndrahay tewle.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Mawri maajum ɓe ngari fahin haa maako, ɓe mbi'i: Min mbaawataa suuɗugo ɗum yeeso jaagorɗo amin. “Ceede njinni, min ngaddani ma dabbaaji amin boo, walaa ko luttani min sey ɓalli amin e gese amin.
Fulfulde_DC: Mawri maajum ɓe ngari fahin haa maako, ɓe mbi'i: Min mbaawataa suuɗugo ɗum yeeso jaagorɗo amin. “Ceede njinni, min ngaddani ma dabbaaji amin boo, walaa ko luttani min sey ɓalli amin e gese amin.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ pɛ‘i yaka kaɗi, wa pia ɗoŋ woyo tɛ-a, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧: «Ɛ́ɛ́ beka hu̧si tɔ̧a̧-a̧ ha̧ wan k’ɛɛ ndé, nɛ́ kpasawen, sede kaɗa kaɗi na. O mɔ-dai lɛŋ nɛ́ ko wan k’ɛɛ kinii. Mɔ nɛ ɓɔna er yɛ mɛ ha̧ ha̧ wan k’ɛɛ, nɛ́ kiitɛ-ɛɛ in o nù k’ɛɛ ɓɛɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ pɛ‘i yaka kaɗi, wa pia ɗoŋ woyo tɛ-a, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧: «Ɛ́ɛ́ beka hu̧si tɔ̧a̧-a̧ ha̧ wan k’ɛɛ ndé, nɛ́ kpasawen, sede kaɗa kaɗi na. O mɔ-dai lɛŋ nɛ́ ko wan k’ɛɛ kinii. Mɔ nɛ ɓɔna er yɛ mɛ ha̧ ha̧ wan k’ɛɛ, nɛ́ kiitɛ-ɛɛ in o nù k’ɛɛ ɓɛɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Kiɗima ta va nyagha ne, hwa'a hɛ shɛ te kwete va, ma ke hɛ shɛ: «Nde sleke ŋkwa, kashɛ ghen'yɛ wəfərəakɛ ghena va gha we. Nahe cɛdɛ yitea dzeve va ghen'yɛ ba'a pɛtɛ wəshi keseɗa ta n'yɛ va gha. Kwete wəsə shɛ ketene va ghen'yɛ kave ŋa keɗema ghəa n'yɛ ba'a yɛ wəvea n'yɛ we.
Tupurri: De maga kiñgi ma sen raw go mono, aà kal wo nduugi da' Josef deeboo äen pa. AÀ day wiin wo ga: Wuur yoñge wañ äin gaa, solay taw we go, day horog ma de fuçy no, wuur a we go de äaara ne wañ äin pa. Gwa' pel wañ äin diñ haçaçgesee wuur wo de sir wuur wo no.

Francais: Pourquoi péririons-nous sous tes yeux, nous et nos terres? Achète-nous, ainsi que nos terres, pour du pain, et nous serons, nous et nos terres, serfs de Pharaon ; et donne-nous de quoi semer, afin que nous vivions et que nous ne mourions pas, et que nos terres ne soient pas désolées. "
Anglais: Wherefore shall we die before thine eyes, both we and our land? buy us and our land for bread, and we and our land will be servants unto Pharaoh: and give us seed, that we may live, and not die, that the land be not desolate.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Naŋ hinma mit vok iraŋ na ɗawn kay mige? Numa hiɗi nagata vuma noŋ kaf naŋ gusma hiɗi sle ma tina, hinma muɗ goy guro-fukunayna vi Farawn, numa hiɗi nagata vuma noŋ kafe. Vulma wa ma jafi, kay numa ma lak iriya, kay sinena vuma ma hin goy busaya ɦawaɗi.
Bulu: Ye bia yiane wu ô lôô, biabebien a mesi mangan? Kuse bia a mesi mangan, mvol a belet, a bia ye bo belo be Faraoñ, bia a mesi mangan, vaʼa bia jôme ya bé si, ane bi ne ke ôsu a nyiñ a bo te wu, nalé ate mesi mangan ma ye bo te bo bilik.
Guiziga: Anja mbak i micam a mihiri ɗike si sukwa? Da ndr' anta na, guva ndrahay a ndiram ngatara lambaˀ. Hiɗika ndra jom ati guva ndraˀahaya ti gwat ngi zum, ɓa i gam gawla ngi buy madiɗa ngi Ezipte. Vula ndra hilfa daw, ɓa i ngiram, i micam ta, ɓa guva ndrahay a ndiram ngatara lambaˀ ta.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Min maaya yeeso ma kadi na? Soodu min e gese amin mbattudi nyaamdu. Minin min laato maccuɓe Firawna bee gese amin. Hokku min aawdi, haa min ngeeɗa, taa min maaya, taa gese amin boo laato duumtuɗe!”
Fulfulde_DC: Min maaya yeeso ma kadi na? Soodu min e gese amin mbattudi nyaamdu. Minin min laato maccuɓe Firawna bee gese amin. Hokku min aawdi, haa min ngeeɗa, taa min maaya, taa gese amin boo laato duumtuɗe!”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɛ́ɛ́ tɛ́ fe bɔɔ ti'nɛ́ nde? K’ɛ̀ɛ̀ bo na, nù k’ɛɛ bó nɛ́ ŋma mɔ na. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gɔ́n zu yɛ in nù k’ɛɛ nɛ nyɔŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ ɛ́ɛ́ in nù k’ɛɛ, ɛ́ɛ́ tɛ de tom ha̧ wannu Egiptɛ. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ kpar-nyɔnɔ h’ɛ́ɛ́, h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ duk kpasa, wen k’ɛɛ tɛɛ fe, ɓɛɛ ká nù tɛɛ ɗaŋ!»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɛ́ɛ́ tɛ́ fe bɔɔ ti'nɛ́ nde? K’ɛ̀ɛ̀ bo na, nù k’ɛɛ bó nɛ́ ŋma mɔ na. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gɔ́n zu yɛ in nù k’ɛɛ nɛ nyɔŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ ɛ́ɛ́ in nù k’ɛɛ, ɛ́ɛ́ tɛ de tom ha̧ wannu Egiptɛ. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ kpar-nyɔnɔ h’ɛ́ɛ́, h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ duk kpasa, wen k’ɛɛ tɛɛ fe, ɓɛɛ ká nù tɛɛ ɗaŋ!»
Kapsiki_DC: Mpə n'yɛ n'yɛ kwa kema ta ŋa gɛ na? Keɗema ghen'yɛ shɛ ne, gəmə wəvea n'yɛ. Pahwe n'yɛ le yɛ wəvea n'yɛ te wəshi kezeme. Katemene nda slene ghen'yɛ le wəvea n'yɛ ke Farawon. Nta n'yɛ felehwe ta wəshi. Ma tsagha, teghweme tenza ghen'yɛ, katempə n'yɛ ba'a katenza wəvea n'yɛ kaɓerama we.»
Tupurri: Wuur mo laä mbe go nen äo de sir wuur wo gla? Yee mbo wuur go de sir wuur wo äuy de reege. Wuur kol ge yañ diñ jar ma wañ äi no, wuuri, sir wuur wo no. Haç mo jo'ge ne wuur lay, nen maga wuur mo hay suggi, wuur mo laä go wa, day pa, daga sir wuurn mo gwa' wo go ko decoo wa.

Francais: Joseph acquit ainsi toutes les terres de l'Égypte à Pharaon; car les Egyptiens vendirent chacun leur champ, parce que la famine les pressait, et le pays devint la propriété de Pharaon.
Anglais: And Joseph bought all the land of Egypt for Pharaoh; for the Egyptians sold every man his field, because the famine prevailed over them: so the land became Pharaoh's.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yosef gus nagat Egipte mi Farawn kafe; kay sum sa Egiptena gigekaw gus sinena valam goyo, kay mayt ka lisi dono ŋolo. Nagat fariya' muɗ goy vi Farawn kafe.
Bulu: Yôsep a nga kuse mesi mese yʼEjipe asu Faraoñ, amu bôte yʼEjipte be nga kuan, môt ase afube dé, amu mfumbale zaé a mbe a bametaʼane be. Si é nga suʼulane bo e jôme Faraoñ.
Guiziga: Dar Zozef a hiɗika guva ngisi ruwuy Ezipte gar da buy Ezipte, asi mbur Ezipte gar na, a hiɗika guva naŋ avra, vur may a bul vu le a vi taŋ. Naŋ kine, ruwuy Ezipte gar, a tiri i ngi buy Ezipte.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yusufu soodani Firawna lesdi Misra fuu. Koo moy Misraajo soorri ngesa mum, ngam weelo ɓilli ɓe. Bana non lesdi fuu laatorani Firawna.
Fulfulde_DC: Yusufu soodani Firawna lesdi Misra fuu. Koo moy Misraajo soorri ngesa mum, ngam weelo ɓilli ɓe. Bana non lesdi fuu laatorani Firawna.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jozɛf hi̧fa nú Egiptɛ lɛŋ ha̧ wannu. O be Egiptɛ lɛŋ ɗɔra nù kɔ‘i, wen kaɓa ŋgaya nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ nù nɛ oi-aa duk nɛ ko wannu.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jozɛf hi̧fa nú Egiptɛ lɛŋ ha̧ wannu. O be Egiptɛ lɛŋ ɗɔra nù kɔ‘i, wen kaɓa ŋgaya nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ nù nɛ oi-aa duk nɛ ko wannu.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Zhozɛf pave nda wəve nyi mbe Ɛzhipte pɛtɛ ke Farawon, va nya nza ŋkɛ nahe yayata nde Ɛzhipte kepamte wəvea ŋkɛ va dzawea ma nya shɛ. Tsagha gɛ ne, nahe pɛtɛa hɛɗi kezhɛre kaŋa Farawon.
Tupurri: Josef yee sir ma Ejipten wo go ne Farawoñ, werga jar Ejipte joñ wo mokay wosela äuy yee pay äen go do ga koñnen hay haç paçaçre ne hara debañ. Day sirn kal kolge go diñ mo ma Farawoñ.

Francais: Il fit passer le peuple dans les villes, d'une extrémité à l'autre du territoire de l'Égypte.
Anglais: And as for the people, he removed them to cities from one end of the borders of Egypt even to the other end thereof.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam jok sumun goy hay hoyok-ziy ma ŋulona tun cawi hay vun nagat Egipte gal hen pa ta-ta hay vuna' hen goŋ'.
Bulu: A nga ke a tooé bôt e bitison, ataté akuʼu di a kui di avoʼo ya minné mi si yʼEjipte.
Guiziga: Zozef a gi beke ti mizli, a slikiɗa taŋ baɗ akẽh, nga mivay ngi ruwuy wãˀ wãˀ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yusufu macciɗini yimɓe Misra, o dahi ɓe diga berniiji, diga keerol gootol haa keerol ngola.
Fulfulde_DC: Yusufu macciɗini yimɓe Misra, o dahi ɓe diga berniiji, diga keerol gootol haa keerol ngola.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jozɛf kaia wa nɛ bara wen dee tom dam nú Egiptɛ lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jozɛf kaia wa nɛ bara wen dee tom dam nú Egiptɛ lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Se te kwete bela ta hɛɗi hwa'a te kwete ne, pɛtɛ Zhozɛf zhɛrete mbeli kaka mavashi.
Tupurri: Jar ma äi sirn wo mokay la se kal tay ti äaara le go äi leege wo, go ti hagu Ejipte leñleñ äuy.

Francais: Il n'y eut que les terres des prêtres qu'il n'acquit pas; car les prêtres recevaient de Pharaon une portion déterminée, et ils vécurent de leur revenu que Pharaon leur assignait : c'est pourquoi ils ne vendirent point leurs terres.
Anglais: Only the land of the priests bought he not; for the priests had a portion assigned them of Pharaoh, and did eat their portion which Pharaoh gave them: wherefore they sold not their lands.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May muliyan-sa-ɗifinna nam may gus liyna visiɗi, kay gatta vi Farawn ta tuni kay lisi slugota, tina visi ma nisi tumna vulsit kayn mi Farawn, kuɗ kayni nam may gus liyna visiɗi.
Bulu: Ve a nji ke kuse mesi betuni, amu njôane Faraoñ éziñ ô mbe ô too mvoʼé asu betuni, e mbe be mbe be nyiñik amu njôane Faraoñ a nga jô mfaʼa wobe te.
Guiziga: Zozef a hiɗik ta na, sey guva ngi masayay, asi buy madiɗa ngi Ezipte a tuh ɓi le toh toh hĩˀĩ vur taŋ. A hiɗika guva taŋhay avra ta, asi a ngiram ti gwat ngi buy Ezipte mavula taŋ di.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Sey gese liman'en tan o soodaay, ngam woodino umroore Firawna mo'ani ɓe. Ɓe nguurdi bee ko Firawna hokkata ɓe. Ngam maajum ɓe coorraay gese maɓɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Sey gese liman'en tan o soodaay, ngam woodino umroore Firawna mo'ani ɓe. Ɓe nguurdi bee ko Firawna hokkata ɓe. Ngam maajum ɓe coorraay gese maɓɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ Jozɛf hi̧fi nù ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ na, wen nɛ̀ wannu Egiptɛ ha̧a̧ so nú zu wa. Nɛ́ a̧ á̧ duka so ha̧ nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ wa. Nɛ́ hegɔ sa wa ɗɔr nù kɔ-wa na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ Jozɛf hi̧fi nù ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ na, wen nɛ̀ wannu Egiptɛ ha̧a̧ so nú zu wa. Nɛ́ a̧ á̧ duka so ha̧ nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ wa. Nɛ́ hegɔ sa wa ɗɔr nù kɔ-wa na.
Kapsiki_DC: Ama deke wəvea ka dzeghe Shala yasema Zhozɛf kapa, va nya gezeyi ghena zlaɓa heli Farawon kaŋa nci. Wəshi nyi fə nda Farawon ke hɛ yazeme hɛ, vatse sema hɛ kapamte wəvea nci.
Tupurri: Ama, aà yee pay mani jar joñ feçeçre sië jagn wo gaa tawa. Werga Farawoñ hay yañ go de haç jag liñgi ma kay jar joñ feçeçre sië jagn wo. AÀ hay wo nen do Farawoñ, haç reege ne hara diñ se. Diñ wersen ga aà yee wo pay äaaran wo go gaè.

Francais: Joseph dit au peuple : " Je vous ai acquis aujourd'hui avec vos terres pour Pharaon. Voici pour vous de la semence, ensemencez la terre.
Anglais: Then Joseph said unto the people, Behold, I have bought you this day and your land for Pharaoh: lo, here is seed for you, and ye shall sow the land.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yosef di tam sumuna: Vaydi nigi hiɗi nagata vigi noŋ kaf nan gusgiyawa mi Farawn; Heɗe, nan vulgi wa ma jafna kayni, nigi as a cuk jafna gaa kay nagata.
Bulu: Yôsep a nga jô bôte na: Me maneya kuse mia den a mesi menan asu Faraoñ; mvoñ, asu denan, e nje nyô; mi ne nguleya futi mvoñ e mesi.
Guiziga: Zozef a ɓa mizli na: «Wurenna i huɗukukum le jom ati guva kumoyo da buy Ezipte so, i sa vulukum hilfa daw, ɓa ki ra zligaka guva kumoyo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yusufu wi'i yimɓe: “Ndaa, jonta kam mi soodi on, onon e gese mooɗon ngam Firawna. Ndaa aawdi mooɗon, aawe gese.
Fulfulde_DC: Yusufu wi'i yimɓe: “Ndaa, jonta kam mi soodi on, onon e gese mooɗon ngam Firawna. Ndaa aawdi mooɗon, aawe gese.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jozɛf hee mbea ha̧ o bíí‘e: «Kinii, ɛ́nɛ́ ɗɔra tɛ‘nɛ́ in nù k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ wannu. Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ́ kpa kpar-nyɔnɔ ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ guna.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jozɛf hee mbea ha̧ o bíí‘e: «Kinii, ɛ́nɛ́ ɗɔra tɛ‘nɛ́ in nù k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ wannu. Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ́ kpa kpar-nyɔnɔ ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ guna.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke Zhozɛf sha mbeli: «Tsetsenya ne, nahe 'ya kepahwe ŋayɛ le wəvea ŋayɛ kaŋa Farawon. Katenta ŋayɛ felehwe ta wəshi 'ya kezha tsawe mbe wəvea ŋayɛ.
Tupurri: Josef wii jarn ga: Ndi yee nday we go wara de sir äayn wo ne Farawoñ. Mbere ma jo'ge mokay no, wo wee mbay jo' ngeel äayn ge wo so.

Francais: A la récolte, vous donnerez le cinquième à Pharaon, et vous aurez les quatre autres parties pour ensemencer vos champs et pour vous nourrir, vous et ceux qui sont dans vos maisons, et pour nourrir vos enfants. "
Anglais: And it shall come to pass in the increase, that ye shall give the fifth part unto Pharaoh, and four parts shall be your own, for seed of the field, and for your food, and for them of your households, and for food for your little ones.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay feɗn ɗawni, nigi ma vul gal ma vaslna vi Farawn, gal ma hin goy fiɗina nam vigi may, kay nigi ma cuk jafn gaa hay sinena, kay nigiya hiɗi gurona vigiya hiɗi sum sa ka hay ziyna vigi kaf ma fi tina.
Bulu: Eyoñe nkôane bidi, mia ye ve Faraoñ ngabe tañe yʼété, mia ye nyoñe mengabe menyine mevok asu ya bé mefube menan, asu bidi bienan, bi bôte be too menda menan a bone benan.
Guiziga: Amma ti hin ngi sifi, ar gwat zlum gar na, ki zuɓam pal da buy Ezipte, a sa ndirukum mufaɗ, ngi zliga guva kumoy, ngi zum ati mizli ngi hay kumoy waɗ ziri kumoyo.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Wakkati codol fuu, on ndokkan Firawna yeɓre woore nder jowi. Geɓe nayi laatanto on ngam aawdi e ngam nyaamdu mooɗon, onon e wonɓe nder ci'e mooɗon e ɓikkoy mooɗon.”
Fulfulde_DC: Wakkati codol fuu, on ndokkan Firawna yeɓre woore nder jowi. Geɓe nayi laatanto on ngam aawdi e ngam nyaamdu mooɗon, onon e wonɓe nder ci'e mooɗon e ɓikkoy mooɗon.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Zaŋ gɛsɛ nyɔnɔ mɔɔrɔ n’ɛnɛ tɛ kpa, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ha̧ kpɔk ha̧ wannu Egiptɛ, ɓɛɛ oi gɛsɛ naar nɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ wen guna-a siti in wen nyɔŋa-a, ɛ́nɛ́, o bíí nutua k’ɛ́nɛ́ in o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Zaŋ gɛsɛ nyɔnɔ mɔɔrɔ n’ɛnɛ tɛ kpa, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ha̧ kpɔk ha̧ wannu Egiptɛ, ɓɛɛ oi gɛsɛ naar nɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ wen guna-a siti in wen nyɔŋa-a, ɛ́nɛ́, o bíí nutua k’ɛ́nɛ́ in o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma te və kemene wəshi se te wəve ne, kateve nda wəsə yɛ təhə mbe mcɛfe ke Farawon. Ma wəshi nyi ketene wəfaɗe ne, kaŋa ŋayɛ nza hɛ kezha tsawe mbe wəvea ŋayɛ ba'a kezha zeme yɛ, gheyɛ, ŋwalea ŋayɛ ba'a mbeli nyi ki ghɛa ŋayɛ.»
Tupurri: Wur maga nday wo weege äe mono nday haç ma de dwee äen ne Farawoñ, ma de naa äe maga sen gwa'ge mo lay no, nday hoo see äe mbere lay, tee lan nday ree de weere äay wo, de jar ma liñ ni äay wo lay.

Francais: Ils dirent : " Nous te devons la vie! Que nous trouvions grâce auprès de mon seigneur, et nous serons esclaves de Pharaon. "
Anglais: And they said, Thou hast saved our lives: let us find grace in the sight of my lord, and we will be Pharaoh's servants.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi dumu: Naŋ suɗma irita vuma'awa, sa ma ŋolla, numa fi slugotawa vok iraŋu, numa min li gorvo vi Farawn muma'a.
Bulu: Be nga jô na: Wo bulane ve bia ényiñ! Bi biya mvolane masa a bia ye bo belo be Faraoñ.
Guiziga: Mizli a mbiɗakaŋ di: «Ki laha ndra hutuŋ le. Ani i lumam gi mezle le a mbuŋ buy ndra, yo i cifam beke ngi buy Ezipte le so.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe njaabi: “A hisni yoŋkiiji amin! Min keɓi mo'ere yeeso jaagorɗo amin, min laatoto maccuɓe Firawna.”
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe njaabi: “A hisni yoŋkiiji amin! Min keɓi mo'ere yeeso jaagorɗo amin, min laatoto maccuɓe Firawna.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa kifa nú: «Ɛ́nɛ́ kpasa ɛ́ɛ́! Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k yɛ nɛ de yí, ɓɛɛ h’ɛ́ɛ́ ya bara ko wannu ɓɛɛ.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa kifa nú: «Ɛ́nɛ́ kpasa ɛ́ɛ́! Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k yɛ nɛ de yí, ɓɛɛ h’ɛ́ɛ́ ya bara ko wannu ɓɛɛ.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke hɛ zhɛnete: «Nahe na kembelete n'yɛ mpia n'yɛ. Ma kwa kemave zlaɓa helia ŋa ghen'yɛ ne, kayɛ ghen'yɛ kanza kaka mavashia Farawon.»
Tupurri: AÀ day wo ga: Yaçaç mbo wuur go! Daga wuur mo ko decoo nen äo wañ äi, day ni wuur kolge mbe yañ diñ gebere Farawoñ.

Francais: Joseph fit de cela une loi, qui subsiste jusqu'à ce jour, et en vertu de laquelle le cinquième du produit des terres d'Égypte appartient à Pharaon ; seules les terres des prêtres ne sont pas à lui.
Anglais: And Joseph made it a law over the land of Egypt unto this day, that Pharaoh should have the fifth part; except the land of the priests only, which became not Pharaoh's.
